original: rdo rje'i lte las so //
analyzed: rdo rje'i lte las so //
translated: From the center of the vajra.

original: sa bzhi ni btsun mo'i chos 'byung gi padma'i nang du'o //
analyzed: sa bzhi ni btsun mo'i chos 'byung gi padma'i nang du'o //
translated: The four stages are within the lotus of the queen's bhaga.

original: de'i tshe nges pa ni nges pa'o ;üîΩ/ thams cad nyid mkhas pas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe nges pa ni nges pa'o ; / thams cad nyid mkhas pas te /
translated: At that time, certainty is ascertainment.

original: shes pa dang shes bya nyid kyi rtogs par rab tu 'jug pas na mkhas pa ste gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po lnga'o //
analyzed: shes pa dang shes bya nyid kyi rtogs par rab tu 'jug pas na mkhas pa ste gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po lnga'o //
translated: All is the five aggregates of form and so forth.

original: 'gyel ba ni lhan cig skyes pa yang dag par thim pa'o //
analyzed: 'gyel ba ni lhan cig skyes pa yang dag par thim pa'o //
translated: Falling is the dissolution of the innate.

original: 'ang gi sgra ni yang gi don te gang gi tshe slar 'di rnam par shes pa rdo rje snying po la @117b sogs nas lha mo'i padma'i nang nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'ang gi sgra ni yang gi don te gang gi tshe slar 'di rnam par shes pa rdo rje snying po la @117b sogs nas lha mo'i padma'i nang nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: The word also has the meaning of when, and when the consciousness again enters the center of the vajra heart, it becomes within the lotus of the goddess.

original: rdo rje'i lte ba nyid de'i tshe mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje'i lte ba nyid de'i tshe mkhas pa'o //
translated: At that time, the wise is the center of the vajra.

original: thams cad nyid mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas ni mchog ni mchog dga'o //
analyzed: thams cad nyid mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas ni mchog ni mchog dga'o //
translated: Having become supremely astonished, supreme is supreme joy.

original: ngo mtshar ni sngar med pa nyams su myong bas rang gi yul las yid thug pa med pa'o //
analyzed: ngo mtshar ni sngar med pa nyams su myong bas rang gi yul las yid thug pa med pa'o //
translated: Astonishment is the mind being overwhelmed by its own object through experiencing what was previously non-existent.

original: gyur pa ni thob pa'o /
analyzed: gyur pa ni thob pa'o /
translated: Becoming is attainment.

original: 'dis ni dbang po rnams bde bar nyams su myong bas yul las ldog pa'o //
analyzed: 'dis ni dbang po rnams bde bar nyams su myong bas yul las ldog pa'o //
translated: This is the reversal of the object by the experience of pleasure of the senses.

original: brgyal ba ni rnam par dga' ba na gti mug par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: brgyal ba ni rnam par dga' ba na gti mug par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: In fainting, there is delusion in the state of delight.

original: gti mug par 'gyur ba yang ji ltar rnam par shes pa yod de //
analyzed: gti mug par 'gyur ba yang ji ltar rnam par shes pa yod de //
translated: And how can there be consciousness in the state of delusion?

original: 'on kyang byed pa ci yang med do //
analyzed: 'on kyang byed pa ci yang med do //
translated: But there is no activity at all.

original: de bzhin du dbang po rnams kyang 'dod chags pas rang gi chags pa las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du dbang po rnams kyang 'dod chags pas rang gi chags pa las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In the same way, the senses are freed from their own attachment by passion.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For this very reason,

original: dang po'i dga' ba 'gro ba'i gzugs //
analyzed: dang po'i dga' ba 'gro ba'i gzugs //
translated: The delight of the first is the form of the world.

original: 'gro ba zhes pa ni ye shes lnga dang sku gsum mo //
analyzed: 'gro ba zhes pa ni ye shes lnga dang sku gsum mo //
translated: The world is the five wisdoms and the three bodies.

original: 'gro ba'i gzugs ni de'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i gzugs ni de'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The form of the world is its nature.

original: dang po gnyis su med pa'o //
analyzed: dang po gnyis su med pa'o //
translated: The first is non-dual.

original: dga' ba zhes pa ni bde ba nyams su myong ba'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: dga' ba zhes pa ni bde ba nyams su myong ba'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: Delight has the characteristic of the experience of pleasure.

original: de bzhin mchog dga' 'gro ba nyid //
analyzed: de bzhin mchog dga' 'gro ba nyid //
translated: In the same way, the supreme delight is the world itself.

original: 'on kyang de las lhag par nyams su myong ba yod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang de las lhag par nyams su myong ba yod pa yin no //
translated: But there is an experience that is superior to that.

original: dga' bral dga' ba'ang 'gro ba nyid //
analyzed: dga' bral dga' ba'ang 'gro ba nyid //
translated: The delight of separation from delight is also the world itself.

original: de las lhag par nyams su myong ba yod pa'o //
analyzed: de las lhag par nyams su myong ba yod pa'o //
translated: and more than that, there is the experience.

original: gsum la yang ni dga' ba gsum las lhan cig skyes pa yod pa yin no //
analyzed: gsum la yang ni dga' ba gsum las lhan cig skyes pa yod pa yin no //
translated: And in the three, there is the innate nature that is beyond the three joys.

original: 'on kyang med pa ni rtag pa dang mi rtag pa dang bde ba dang mi bde ba dang bden pa dang mi bden par mi dmigs pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'on kyang med pa ni rtag pa dang mi rtag pa dang bde ba dang mi bde ba dang bden pa dang mi bden par mi dmigs pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir /
translated: But it is not nonexistent, because of the nature of the nonapprehension of permanence and impermanence, of pleasure and pain, of truth and untruth.

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i 'gro ba'i gzugs nyid do //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i 'gro ba'i gzugs nyid do //
translated: It is the innate nature of the form of the world.

original: khu ba dang bde ba dag ldog pa med pa'i rgyu yin te /
analyzed: khu ba dang bde ba dag ldog pa med pa'i rgyu yin te /
translated: The semen and the bliss are the cause of the noncessation.

original: rgyu mtshan 'dis na bcom ldan 'das lha mo'i padma'i nang du thim pa yin no //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan 'dis na bcom ldan 'das lha mo'i padma'i nang du thim pa yin no //
translated: By this reason, the Lord dissolves into the lotus of the goddess.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: And for that very reason,

original: kye rdo rje ste gang las bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid do //
analyzed: kye rdo rje ste gang las bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid do //
translated: it is the Vajra of Delight, from which the nature of the two truths.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gcig pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbyer med pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gcig pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbyer med pa'i sku'o //
translated: The one body of all the Buddhas is the body of the indivisibility of all the Tathagatas.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
translated: And for that very reason, it is said:

original: bka' stsal te /
analyzed: bka' stsal te /
translated: The Blessed One said:üîΩThe one body of all the Buddhas,

original: kun du snang ba brjod pa yang dag par rig pa ye shes lnga'i sku nyid kyis brjod pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das so //
analyzed: kun du snang ba brjod pa yang dag par rig pa ye shes lnga'i sku nyid kyis brjod pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das so //
translated: The BhagavƒÅn is the one who is the nature of the expression of the five gnoses of the body of the all-illuminating expression.

original: ci yin pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci yin pa gsungs pa /
translated: What is that?

original: rdo rje snying pos rtogs bya'i phyir //
analyzed: rdo rje snying pos rtogs bya'i phyir //
translated: In order to realize the vajra essence,

original: the tshom legs par sel ba ni //
analyzed: the tshom legs par sel ba ni //
translated: the doubts are well removed.

original: gsum la lhan cig skyes pa med //
analyzed: gsum la lhan cig skyes pa med //
translated: The three are not connate.

original: ces pa gang 'dis rdo rje snying po la sogs pa the tshom du gyur pa'i the tshom de bsal bar bya ba'i phyir gsungs @118a * //
analyzed: ces pa gang 'dis rdo rje snying po la sogs pa the tshom du gyur pa'i the tshom de bsal bar bya ba'i phyir gsungs @118a * //
translated: Whatever this is, the vajra essence and so on, the doubts that have arisen are removed.

original: pa'o ; / rdo rje snying pos rtogs bya'i phyir ni rtogs par bya ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: pa'o ; / rdo rje snying pos rtogs bya'i phyir ni rtogs par bya ba'i phyir te /
translated: In order to realize the vajra essence is for the sake of realization.

original: rdo rje snying po nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid kyang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje snying po nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid kyang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Since the vajra essence is fully and completely enlightened, all tathƒÅgatas are also fully and completely enlightened.

original: de gsungs pa /
analyzed: de gsungs pa /
translated: That is said:

original: 'dod chags med cing chags bral med //
analyzed: 'dod chags med cing chags bral med //
translated: There is no passion and no freedom from passion,

original: dbu ma dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dbu ma dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the middle is not apprehended.

original: gsum po spangs pa nyid kyi phyir //
analyzed: gsum po spangs pa nyid kyi phyir //
translated: Because of the abandonment of the three,

original: lhan cig skyes pa byang chub brjod //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa byang chub brjod //
translated: the innate is called enlightenment.

original: gsum ni dga' ba la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: gsum ni dga' ba la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: The three are joy and so forth.

original: spangs pa'i phyir na yongs su spangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spangs pa'i phyir na yongs su spangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of abandonment, because of complete abandonment.

original: thams cad ni chags pa can yin la /
analyzed: thams cad ni chags pa can yin la /
translated: All are attached,

original: lhan cig skyes pa ni slar chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas gsum po rnams spangs pa'o //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa ni slar chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas gsum po rnams spangs pa'o //
translated: but the innate is characterized by non-attachment again, so it is the abandonment of the three.

original: 'dis ni lhan cig skyes pa byang chub brjod do //
analyzed: 'dis ni lhan cig skyes pa byang chub brjod do //
translated: By this, the innate is called enlightenment.

original: de ni bcom ldan kye'i rdo rje ste stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'o //
analyzed: de ni bcom ldan kye'i rdo rje ste stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'o //
translated: That is the BhagavƒÅn Hevajra, emptiness and compassion inseparable.

original: de nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gcig pa ni sangs rgyas kun ni gnyis med du rtogs pa'o ;
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gcig pa ni sangs rgyas kun ni gnyis med du rtogs pa'o ;
translated: Therefore, the single body of all buddhas is the realization of non-duality.

original: / sku ni chags pa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: / sku ni chags pa dang bral ba'o //
translated: The body is free from attachment.

original: rdo rje snying po ni gnyis su med pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: rdo rje snying po ni gnyis su med pa'i sku'o //
translated: The vajra essence is the non-dual body.

original: the tshom sel ba ni rtog pa spangs pa'i rnam par mi rtog pa'i rang bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: the tshom sel ba ni rtog pa spangs pa'i rnam par mi rtog pa'i rang bzhin nyid do //
translated: The dispeller of doubts is the non-conceptual nature that abandons concepts.

original: legs par ni lha'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: legs par ni lha'i bdag nyid do //
translated: Well is the nature of the deity.

original: rtogs bya'i phyir ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtogs bya'i phyir ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: For the sake of realization is for the sake of attaining perfect buddhahood.

original: gsungs pa ; / dus gsum du chos ston par mdzad pa yin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gsungs pa ; / dus gsum du chos ston par mdzad pa yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: It is said: He teaches the Dharma in the three times.

original: de nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid gsungs pa /
translated: That itself is said:

original: 'dod chags med cing ste chags pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: 'dod chags med cing ste chags pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: Without attachment is the characteristic of attachment.

original: chags bral med ni de yongs su spangs pa'o //
analyzed: chags bral med ni de yongs su spangs pa'o //
translated: Without non-attachment is the complete abandonment of that.

original: 'di gnyi gar yang gnyis med par ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di gnyi gar yang gnyis med par ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because both of these are not realized as non-dual.

original: dbu ma de yang mi dmigs te /
analyzed: dbu ma de yang mi dmigs te /
translated: That middle way is also non-apprehensible,

original: mi dmigs pa'i phyir mi dmigs pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa'i phyir mi dmigs pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because of non-apprehension, because of the nature of non-apprehension.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsum po spangs pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsum po spangs pa'o //
translated: For that very reason, it is abandoned in the three.

original: chags pa dang chags pa med pa dag chags pa nyid kyis gnyi ga las 'das pa'i phyir mo gsham gyi bu bzhin no //
analyzed: chags pa dang chags pa med pa dag chags pa nyid kyis gnyi ga las 'das pa'i phyir mo gsham gyi bu bzhin no //
translated: Because attachment and non-attachment are both transcended by attachment itself, like the son of a barren woman.

original: 'dis ni gsum po yongs su spangs pa gang de nyid lhan cig skyes pa yang dag pa'i byang chub ste yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni gsum po yongs su spangs pa gang de nyid lhan cig skyes pa yang dag pa'i byang chub ste yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes yin no //
translated: This is the innate perfect enlightenment, the gnosis of perfect enlightenment, which is the complete abandonment of the three.

original: yang na chags med ni 'khor ba med pa'o //
analyzed: yang na chags med ni 'khor ba med pa'o //
translated: Or else, nonattachment is non-samsara.

original: chags bral med ni mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: chags bral med ni mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin pa ste /
translated: Non-detachment is non-nirvana.

original: gang 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: gang 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: That which is neither samsara nor nirvana

original: de ni dbu ma'i rtse zhes brjod do //
analyzed: de ni dbu ma'i rtse zhes brjod do //
translated: is called the peak of the middle way.

original: de yang dmigs par mi 'gyur ni mi @118b dmigs pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang dmigs par mi 'gyur ni mi @118b dmigs pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And that is not an object, because it has the nature of non-apprehension.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For this very reason,

original: gsum po spangs pa ni nye bar mi dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: gsum po spangs pa ni nye bar mi dmigs pa'o //
translated: the abandonment of the three is non-apprehension.

original: rgyu 'di nyid kyi phyir lhan cig skyes pa nyid yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces brjod do //
analyzed: rgyu 'di nyid kyi phyir lhan cig skyes pa nyid yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces brjod do //
translated: For this very reason, the innate is called perfect complete enlightenment.

original: yang na 'dod chags med ni mchog dga' ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: yang na 'dod chags med ni mchog dga' ma yin pa'o //
translated: Or else, non-attachment is not supreme joy.

original: chags bral med ni rnam par dga' ba ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: chags bral med ni rnam par dga' ba ma yin pa'o //
translated: Non-detachment is not complete joy.

original: dbu mar mi 'gyur ba ni /
analyzed: dbu mar mi 'gyur ba ni /
translated: The middle is not a transformation.

original: dga' ba tsam zhes pa'i tshig gis na dbu ma yin no //
analyzed: dga' ba tsam zhes pa'i tshig gis na dbu ma yin no //
translated: The word ‚Äúmerely‚Äù in ‚Äúmere joy‚Äù indicates the middle.

original: de thams cad mi dmigs pa ste gsum pos slar lhan cig skyes pa'i yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi rang bzhin gyi rtog pa spangs pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: de thams cad mi dmigs pa ste gsum pos slar lhan cig skyes pa'i yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi rang bzhin gyi rtog pa spangs pa nyid yin te /
translated: All of that is non-apprehension, and by the three, the innate nature of perfect awakening is abandoned.

original: 'byin pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid yin par dgongs so //
analyzed: 'byin pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid yin par dgongs so //
translated: The ma·πá·∏çala of the bindu is the nature of the bindu.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Therefore,üîΩall are the self,

original: yang na de nyid thams cad bdag / yang na kun gyis rnam par spangs //
analyzed: yang na de nyid thams cad bdag / yang na kun gyis rnam par spangs //
translated: or all are completely abandoned.

original: thams cad bdag ni 'gro ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad bdag ni 'gro ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: All are the self because of being the nature of migrating beings.

original: kun gyis yongs su spangs pa ni 'gro ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro snyam pa'i dngos po dbye bas rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: kun gyis yongs su spangs pa ni 'gro ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro snyam pa'i dngos po dbye bas rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: All are completely abandoned because of being the nature of migrating beings.

original: yang na / yang na zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gnyis dbyer med pa gnyis so //
analyzed: yang na / yang na zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gnyis dbyer med pa gnyis so //
translated: Or, ‚Äúor‚Äù refers to the two inseparable ma·πá·∏çalas.

original: thams cad bdag ni 'gro ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad bdag ni 'gro ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: All are the self because of being the nature of migrating beings.

original: de nyid ces pa ni shes rab kyi tshul cha shas med pa'i phyir bsdu ba'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid ces pa ni shes rab kyi tshul cha shas med pa'i phyir bsdu ba'i rnam pa'o //
translated: That itself is the mode of wisdom, and because it is partless, it is the aspect of inclusion.

original: yang na kun gyis ni 'gro ba rnams kyis so //
analyzed: yang na kun gyis ni 'gro ba rnams kyis so //
translated: Or else, by all means, by all beings.

original: spangs pa ni rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gzugs kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa dang dbyer med pas de rnams spro ba'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de'i bdag nyid kyis gnas pa de yang rdo rje 'dzin pa spangs pa ste /
analyzed: spangs pa ni rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gzugs kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa dang dbyer med pas de rnams spro ba'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de'i bdag nyid kyis gnas pa de yang rdo rje 'dzin pa spangs pa ste /
translated: Abandonment is the indivisibility of the form of the various aspects of Vajradhara and those emanations, and the way of the emanation of those is the abiding of the tathƒÅgatas in the nature of that Vajradhara.

original: de dag kyang tha dad pa yin no //
analyzed: de dag kyang tha dad pa yin no //
translated: And those are different.

original: de yang dga' bral dang por mtshon //
analyzed: de yang dga' bral dang por mtshon //
translated: That is also indicated as the first separation from joy.

original: dga' ba gsum po rnam par spangs //
analyzed: dga' ba gsum po rnam par spangs //
translated: Abandoning the three joys,

original: de lta bur gyur pa'i lhan cig skyes pa de ji lta bur yid ches par bya ba'i thabs bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa'i lhan cig skyes pa de ji lta bur yid ches par bya ba'i thabs bstan pa yin te /
translated: the method of demonstrating that connate state is taught.

original: dga' bral yang yin la dang po yang yin pas dga' bral dang po'o //
analyzed: dga' bral yang yin la dang po yang yin pas dga' bral dang po'o //
translated: It is the first separation from joy, because it is the first separation from joy.

original: dang po'i sgra ni dga' ba'o //
analyzed: dang po'i sgra ni dga' ba'o //
translated: The word first is joy.

original: dga' bral gyi sgra ni rnam par dga' ba'o //
analyzed: dga' bral gyi sgra ni rnam par dga' ba'o //
translated: The word separation from joy is the joy of separation.

original: bar ma mchog dga' yang so sor bsdu ba gzung ngo //
analyzed: bar ma mchog dga' yang so sor bsdu ba gzung ngo //
translated: The intermediate is supreme joy, which is also to be included separately.

original: de la yod pa nger lhan cig skyes pa mtshon par bya'o //
analyzed: de la yod pa nger lhan cig skyes pa mtshon par bya'o //
translated: There, the innate is to be indicated as existing.

original: cis khyad par 'phags she na /üîΩdga' ba gsum po rnam par spangs //
analyzed: cis khyad par 'phags she na / dga' ba gsum po rnam par spangs //
translated: By what is it distinguished?üîΩIt is free from the three joys.

original: dga' ba gsum yongs su spangs pa'o //üîΩyang na dga' bral dang por zhes pa ni rnam par dga' ba yang de dang por yang yin pas rnam dga' dang por te mchog dga'i mthar ro //
analyzed: dga' ba gsum yongs su spangs pa'o // yang na dga' bral dang por zhes pa ni rnam par dga' ba yang de dang por yang yin pas rnam dga' dang por te mchog dga'i mthar ro //
translated: It is free from the three joys.

original: rnam par dga' @119a * //
analyzed: rnam par dga' @119a * //
translated: Or, the first of the separations from joy is the first of the separations, because it is the first of the separations. It is at the end of supreme joy.

original: ba dang por yod pa der lhan cig skyes pa mtshon par bya ba'o //
analyzed: ba dang por yod pa der lhan cig skyes pa mtshon par bya ba'o //
translated: The first of the separations exists there, and the innate is to be indicated there.

original: cis khyad 'phags she na /üîΩdga' ba gsum po rnam par spangs //
analyzed: cis khyad 'phags she na / dga' ba gsum po rnam par spangs //
translated: By what is it distinguished?üîΩIt is free from the three joys.

original: dga' ba gsum log pa'o //
analyzed: dga' ba gsum log pa'o //
translated: It is free from the three joys.

original: ji ltar zhe na spangs pa ste yongs su spangs pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na spangs pa ste yongs su spangs pa'o //
translated: How? It is free, it is completely abandoned.

original: lha mo'i padma'i nang du chad pa de yin pa'i don te //
analyzed: lha mo'i padma'i nang du chad pa de yin pa'i don te //
translated: It is the cessation in the lotus of the goddess.

original: de lta bur gyur pa'i lhan cig skyes pa gang dga' ba bzhi'i rang bzhin de ci 'dra ba cig yin pa de gsungs pa /
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa'i lhan cig skyes pa gang dga' ba bzhi'i rang bzhin de ci 'dra ba cig yin pa de gsungs pa /
translated: The nature of that innate joy, which is such, is now stated.

original: dang por sprin dang 'dra ba yin //
analyzed: dang por sprin dang 'dra ba yin //
translated: First, it is like a cloud.

original: grub pa sgyu ma lta bur 'gyur //üîΩbab col rmi lam 'dra bar snang //
analyzed: grub pa sgyu ma lta bur 'gyur // bab col rmi lam 'dra bar snang //
translated: Accomplishment is like an illusion.üîΩCarefree, it appears like a dream.

original: nyal dang log pa khyad med 'dra //
analyzed: nyal dang log pa khyad med 'dra //
translated: It is like a sleep, no different from a fall.

original: dang po zhes pa ni dga' ba'i rang bzhin te /
analyzed: dang po zhes pa ni dga' ba'i rang bzhin te /

original: gang gi tshe sprin pa dang 'dra bar snang ba'i tshe ye shes bsgribs pa dang 'dra bar so sor snang ngo //
analyzed: gang gi tshe sprin pa dang 'dra bar snang ba'i tshe ye shes bsgribs pa dang 'dra bar so sor snang ngo //
translated: When it appears like a cloud, it appears individually like a covered intuition.

original: reg par 'dod pa nyid kyis reg pa'i bde ba tsam nyid gnas so //
analyzed: reg par 'dod pa nyid kyis reg pa'i bde ba tsam nyid gnas so //
translated: By the mere desire to touch, the bliss of touch remains.

original: ye shes gzhan slar bsgribs pa yin no //
analyzed: ye shes gzhan slar bsgribs pa yin no //
translated: Another intuition is covered again.

original: grub pa'ang sgyu ma lta bur 'gyur //
analyzed: grub pa'ang sgyu ma lta bur 'gyur //
translated: Accomplishment is like an illusion.

original: zhes pa ni mchog tu dga' ba bde ba nyams su myong ba'i mtshan nyid yod pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni mchog tu dga' ba bde ba nyams su myong ba'i mtshan nyid yod pa ste /
translated: This has the characteristic of the experience of supreme joy bliss.

original: sgyu ma lta ni sgyu ma lta bur gyur pa'o //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta ni sgyu ma lta bur gyur pa'o //
translated: Like an illusion, it is like an illusion.

original: ji srid du so sor snang ba na thams cad bden pa yang ma yin brdzun pa yang ma yin zhing yul dang dbang po dang rnam par shes pa 'khril ba'i bde ba nyams su myong ba 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ji srid du so sor snang ba na thams cad bden pa yang ma yin brdzun pa yang ma yin zhing yul dang dbang po dang rnam par shes pa 'khril ba'i bde ba nyams su myong ba 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: As long as there is a separate appearance, nothing is true or false, and the experience of the bliss of the union of object, faculty, and consciousness arises.

original: bab col ni skad cig ma gcig nyid la rnam par dga' ba yod pa dbang po dang yul dang rnam par shes pa rnams mngon par zhen pa dang bral ba gcig pa tsam du bde bar myong ba'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: bab col ni skad cig ma gcig nyid la rnam par dga' ba yod pa dbang po dang yul dang rnam par shes pa rnams mngon par zhen pa dang bral ba gcig pa tsam du bde bar myong ba'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The ‚Äúrandom‚Äù is the experience of bliss in a single moment of delight, the mere unity free from attachment of the faculties, objects, and consciousnesses.

original: rmi lam 'dra bar snang ni rmi lam gyi shes pa dang 'dra bar so sor snang ba ste /
analyzed: rmi lam 'dra bar snang ni rmi lam gyi shes pa dang 'dra bar so sor snang ba ste /
translated: The ‚Äúappearance like a dream‚Äù is the separate appearance like the consciousness of a dream.

original: 'di thams cad bden pa yang ma yin brdzun pa yang yin zhing nyams su myong ba'i mtshan nyid kyang grub pa med do //
analyzed: 'di thams cad bden pa yang ma yin brdzun pa yang yin zhing nyams su myong ba'i mtshan nyid kyang grub pa med do //
translated: All of this is neither true nor false, and the characteristic of experience is also not established.

original: nyal dang log par khyad par med //
analyzed: nyal dang log par khyad par med //
translated: There is no difference between sleeping and not sleeping.

original: ces pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes slar 'di nyid zung du 'jug pa bden pa dang mi bden pa dbyer med pa'i ye shes yin te /
analyzed: ces pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes slar 'di nyid zung du 'jug pa bden pa dang mi bden pa dbyer med pa'i ye shes yin te /
translated: This is the primordial wisdom of coemergence, which is the union of this very [primordial wisdom] with itself, the primordial wisdom of the inseparability of the real and the unreal.

original: bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yin no //
analyzed: bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yin no //
translated: It is the primordial wisdom of omniscience, which is the nature of the two truths.

original: slar bskyed pa'i rim par de nyid dkyil 'khor bsgom pa na /
analyzed: slar bskyed pa'i rim par de nyid dkyil 'khor bsgom pa na /
translated: When one meditates on the ma·πá·∏çala of that very [primordial wisdom] in the stage of generation,

original: yang dag pa'i byang chub 'byung ba'i mtshan ma yin par gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i byang chub 'byung ba'i mtshan ma yin par gsungs pa /
translated: it is said to be the sign of the arising of perfect enlightenment.

original: dang por sprin dang 'dra bar snang //
analyzed: dang por sprin dang 'dra bar snang //
translated: First, it appears like a cloud.

original: grub pa sgyu ma lta bur 'gyur //
analyzed: grub pa sgyu ma lta bur 'gyur //
translated: When accomplished, it is like an illusion.

original: bab col rmi lam 'dra bar snang //
analyzed: bab col rmi lam 'dra bar snang //
translated: It appears like a dream.

original: nyal dang log pa khyad med 'dra //
analyzed: nyal dang log pa khyad med 'dra //
translated: It is no different from sleeping and lying down.

original: dkyil 'khor de dang por @119b bsgom pa na sprin dang 'dra ba ni ji ltar sprin pa nam mkha'i dkyil du phan tshun du 'khrigs nas /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor de dang por @119b bsgom pa na sprin dang 'dra ba ni ji ltar sprin pa nam mkha'i dkyil du phan tshun du 'khrigs nas /
translated: When one first meditates on that ma·πá·∏çala, it is like a cloud. Just as a cloud gathers in the middle of the sky,

analyzed: dmigs pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyis cung zhig kyang nus pa med do //
translated: it has no power at all due to its nature of being without reference.

original: de bzhin du dkyil 'khor yang phan tshun du lha nyid 'dus nas dmigs pa med par so sor snang ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du dkyil 'khor yang phan tshun du lha nyid 'dus nas dmigs pa med par so sor snang ngo //
translated: Likewise, the mandala is also mutually gathered into the deity itself, appearing individually without reference.

original: gang gi tshe slar grub pa ni mngon du gyur nas de'i tshe sgyu ma bzhin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe slar grub pa ni mngon du gyur nas de'i tshe sgyu ma bzhin no //
translated: When it is again accomplished, it is manifest, and at that time it is like an illusion.

original: sgyu ma nyid ni /
analyzed: sgyu ma nyid ni /
translated: An illusion itself is

analyzed: ji ltar sgyu ma mngon sum grub pas bden pa yang ma yin no //

analyzed: de bzhin du dkyil 'khor yang bden pa yang ma yin brdzun pa yang ma yin par gang gi tshe snang ba de'i tshe grub pa yin no //

original: de'i tshe lha thams cad mngon du gyur bar bstan pa /
analyzed: de'i tshe lha thams cad mngon du gyur bar bstan pa /
translated: At that time, all the deities are taught to be manifest.

original: bab col ni de ma thag pa'i skad cig las so //
analyzed: bab col ni de ma thag pa'i skad cig las so //
translated: Spontaneous is from the immediate moment.

original: rmi lam 'dra ni /
analyzed: rmi lam 'dra ni /
translated: Like a dreamüîΩis like a dream, in that everything is not true, and the experience is present there.

original: ji ltar rmi lam thams cad nyid du bden pa ma yin zhing nyams su myong ba de la yod pa yin no // de bzhin du rmi lam 'dra bar snang ngo //
analyzed: ji ltar rmi lam thams cad nyid du bden pa ma yin zhing nyams su myong ba de la yod pa yin no // de bzhin du rmi lam 'dra bar snang ngo //
translated: Thus, it appears like a dream.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For that very reason,

original: nyal dang log pa khyad med 'dra //
analyzed: nyal dang log pa khyad med 'dra //

analyzed: nyal ba ni gnyid log pa'i gnas skabs dang sad pa'i gnas skabs so //

analyzed: dper na 'ga' zhig gis sad pa nyid nyal bar mthong ngo //

analyzed: de bzhin du ye shes bden pa nyid de thams cad yin du chug kyang sgyu ma rmi lam lta bu yin no //

analyzed: yang na / dang por sprin dang 'dra bar snang //

analyzed: zhes pa ni /

analyzed: dang por zhes pa ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //

analyzed: de nyid grub pa ni dngos su mngon du 'gyur ba'o //

analyzed: sgyu ma 'dra bar 'gyur ni sgyu ma lta bu yin te /

original: aa bdag med ma bde ba'o //

original: de ltar ma khu ba dang bde ba dbyer med pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar ma khu ba dang bde ba dbyer med pa'o //

analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa'i ye shes 'di de gang la yod pa de ni sgyu ma 'dra ba'o //

original: 'gyur ba ni rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'gyur ba ni rdzogs pa'o //

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /

analyzed: grub pa'o // 'ang gi sgra ni nges pa'i don te de nyid do //

original: de lta bur gyur pa'i bab col ni de ma thag pa'i skad cig nyid las so ;
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa'i bab col ni de ma thag pa'i skad cig nyid las so ;
translated: The suddenness is from the very moment of the arising of that gnosis.

original: / rmi lam 'dra bar snang ni /
analyzed: / rmi lam 'dra bar snang ni /

analyzed: ye shes de yang ye shes kyi mngon par zhen pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For that very reason,

analyzed: nyal dang log pa khyad med 'dra //

original: nyal ba ni bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: nyal ba ni bsdu ba'o //

original: sad pa ni spro ba'o //
analyzed: sad pa ni spro ba'o //

analyzed: dbyer med pa nyid zung du 'jug pa'i phyir yin no //

analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir / dngos grub mtshan nyid dbyer med @120a * //
translated: For that very reason,üîΩthe yogin is accomplished by the seal

original: pa ; / phyag rgya rnal 'byor pa yis 'grub //
analyzed: pa ; / phyag rgya rnal 'byor pa yis 'grub //

original: mtshan nyid de de'i dngos grub ni dngos grub mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: mtshan nyid de de'i dngos grub ni dngos grub mtshan nyid do //

analyzed: dbyer med pa'i rgyu'i mtshan nyid kyi dngos grub po //

original: phyag rgya ni phyag rgya chen po'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya ni phyag rgya chen po'o //

original: de dang lhan cig rnal 'byor pa 'dus pa gang la yod pa des ni nges par 'grub po //
analyzed: de dang lhan cig rnal 'byor pa 'dus pa gang la yod pa des ni nges par 'grub po //
translated: The yogi who is united with that is certainly perfected.

original: yang na phyag rgya yang yin la rnal 'byor yang yin pas phyag rgya rnal 'byor pa ste bdag med ma dang dbyer med pa'i rdo rje 'dzin no //
analyzed: yang na phyag rgya yang yin la rnal 'byor yang yin pas phyag rgya rnal 'byor pa ste bdag med ma dang dbyer med pa'i rdo rje 'dzin no //

original: grub pa ni rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: grub pa ni rdzogs pa'o //

analyzed: kun rdzob tu yang mi phyed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi dngos grub po //

analyzed: kun du kun nas kyi rnam pas grub pa ni grub pa'o //

analyzed: dbyer med pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid do //

original: ji ltar sprin dang sgyu ma dang rmi lam la sogs pa'i dpe des gang gi tshe dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa de'i tshe phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor par 'gyur ro //

original: de nas grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas grub par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: ston pas dkyil 'khor 'di skad gsungs //

analyzed: dkyil 'khor de nyid gsungs pa /

analyzed: gru bzhi yang dag 'bar ba nyid //

analyzed: sgo bzhi gzi brjid chen po ste //

analyzed: dra ba dra ba phyed pas brgyan //

analyzed: phreng ba sna tshogs rnga yab ldan //

analyzed: bdug pa mar me de bzhin dri //

analyzed: bum pa brgyad la sogs par ldan //

analyzed: rnam par rgyal ba shar du sbyin //

original: don 'di thams cad go sla'o //
analyzed: don 'di thams cad go sla'o //

original: rdzogs pa'i rim par na /
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim par na /

analyzed: gru zhi par zhes pa ni /

original: dga' ba bzhi'i rang bzhin zhes so //
analyzed: dga' ba bzhi'i rang bzhin zhes so //

original: yang dag 'bar ni 'od gsal lo //
analyzed: yang dag 'bar ni 'od gsal lo //

analyzed: sgo bzhi ni de nyid kyi phyir srid pa'i dgon pa bzhi las nges par 'byin pa'i thabs kyis so //

analyzed: gzi brjid chen po ni thams cad stong pa'i phyir ro //

translated: Adorned with nets and half-nets means that just as a precious pearl necklace is strung on a single thread, in the same way, the various precious things of the five pristine awarenesses, three bodies, and so forth are strung without duality.

analyzed: phreng ba ni me tog gi phreng ba'o //

analyzed: sna tshogs rnga yab ni kha dog sna tshogs pa'o //

analyzed: ji ltar me rtog gi phreng ba yang me tog sna tshogs du ma'i rigs brgyus pa yin no //

analyzed: yi ge aa'i sgra ni bdag med ma ste de'i rang bzhin nyid kyi ye shes kun no //
translated: The sound of the syllable A is Nairatmya, and all gnosis is of her nature.

original: de'i phyir dang por ni sngon du'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir dang por ni sngon du'o //
translated: Therefore, first, is before.

original: sbyin pa ni yongs su spangs pa'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa ni yongs su spangs pa'o //
translated: Giving is complete abandonment.

original: dang po nyid 'di la med pa ste de med pas mtha' ma dang dbus kyang med pa nyid do //
analyzed: dang po nyid 'di la med pa ste de med pas mtha' ma dang dbus kyang med pa nyid do //
translated: Since this beginning is not here, i.e., does not exist, the end and the middle also do not exist.

original: de nyid kyi phyir thams cad bdag med pas phug pa yis de bzhin gshegs pa dam pa yang dag par tshim par gyur pa'o ;
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir thams cad bdag med pas phug pa yis de bzhin gshegs pa dam pa yang dag par tshim par gyur pa'o ;
translated: Therefore, all is empty, and the Sugata is satisfied with that.

original: / ji ltar bsam gtan de bzhin 'dir //
analyzed: / ji ltar bsam gtan de bzhin 'dir //
translated: Just as in the case of the meditative concentration, so here

original: srung ba ji ltar gsungs pa nyid ni /
analyzed: srung ba ji ltar gsungs pa nyid ni /
translated: the protection is just as it was taught.

original: 'bad pas h'um las rdo rje can //
analyzed: 'bad pas h'um las rdo rje can //
translated: With effort, the vajra possessor arises from the syllable hum.

original: zhes gang mdor bstan pa de'i rgyas par bshad pa'o //
analyzed: zhes gang mdor bstan pa de'i rgyas par bshad pa'o //
translated: This is the extensive explanation of what was taught in brief:

original: ram las nyi ma sngon du rnams bsgoms nas /
analyzed: ram las nyi ma sngon du rnams bsgoms nas /
translated: Having previously contemplated the sun arisen from the syllable ram,üîΩthe vajra possessor arises from the hum in the sun.

original: nyi der h'um byung sna tshogs rdo rje de nyid kyis ni rab dang gur bcing ba yang rnam par bsgom pa nyid //
analyzed: nyi der h'um byung sna tshogs rdo rje de nyid kyis ni rab dang gur bcing ba yang rnam par bsgom pa nyid //
translated: With that vajra cross, one should contemplate the protection wheel and the protection tent.

original: ces pa'i bsam gtan ji lta ba de bzhin du 'dir yang dkyil 'khor bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: ces pa'i bsam gtan ji lta ba de bzhin du 'dir yang dkyil 'khor bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that just as in the case of the meditative concentration, so here also one should create the mandala.

original: nang gi don du na yang lha'i rim par phye ba nyid du ram las nyi ma zhes pa bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa'i phyir gsungs so //
analyzed: nang gi don du na yang lha'i rim par phye ba nyid du ram las nyi ma zhes pa bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa'i phyir gsungs so //
translated: And in the inner sense, it is said in order to teach the verse beginning with ‚Äúfrom the RAM arises the sun‚Äù which is divided into the stages of the deities.

original: dkyil 'khor der dbang bskur ba sbyin pa de gsungs pa //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor der dbang bskur ba sbyin pa de gsungs pa //
translated: He speaks of the bestowal of initiation into that mandala:

original: gang zhig dbang ni rab phye ba //
analyzed: gang zhig dbang ni rab phye ba //
translated: ‚ÄúThat initiation which is well-divided

original: rang gi dkyil 'khor mchog bzhin sbyin //
analyzed: rang gi dkyil 'khor mchog bzhin sbyin //
translated: is to be bestowed like the supreme mandala of one‚Äôs own.‚Äù

original: gang zhig dbang ni chu la sogs pa gsungs pa de rnams so //
analyzed: gang zhig dbang ni chu la sogs pa gsungs pa de rnams so //
translated: That initiation which is well-divided is the one taught by means of the water and so forth.

original: cho ga bzhin ni cho ga'i rim pa bzhin du sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: cho ga bzhin ni cho ga'i rim pa bzhin du sbyin par bya'o //
translated: It is to be bestowed according to the rite, according to the sequence of the rite.

original: rang gi dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni mos pa'i khyad par gyis dkyil 'khor byas pa yin pa'i don to //
analyzed: rang gi dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni mos pa'i khyad par gyis dkyil 'khor byas pa yin pa'i don to //
translated: One‚Äôs own mandala means that the mandala is made by means of the particular faith.

original: yang na gang zhig dbang ni /
analyzed: yang na gang zhig dbang ni /
translated: Or else, that initiation which is well-divided

original: dbang bskur bas sgrib pa med par byed pa'o //
analyzed: dbang bskur bas sgrib pa med par byed pa'o //
translated: is the one which makes the obscurations non-existent by means of the bestowal of initiation.

original: cis khyad 'phags she na /
analyzed: cis khyad 'phags she na /
translated: By what is it distinguished?

original: rang gsal ba ni 'od gsal gyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: rang gsal ba ni 'od gsal gyi rang bzhin no //
translated: It is self-luminous, having the nature of clear light.

original: gang las she na /
analyzed: gang las she na /
translated: From what?

original: rang gi dkyil 'khor las te /
analyzed: rang gi dkyil 'khor las te /
translated: From one‚Äôs own mandala.

original: rang yang dag par rig pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: rang yang dag par rig pa'i ye shes so //
translated: and one‚Äôs own intuition of pure awareness.

original: de cho ga bzhin sbyin no /
analyzed: de cho ga bzhin sbyin no /
translated: One should give it according to the rite.

original: cho ga ni cho ga'i @122b bya ba gang la yod pa da yin te rang rig pa'i ye shes de'i ye shes ni cho ga bzhin du'o //
analyzed: cho ga ni cho ga'i @122b bya ba gang la yod pa da yin te rang rig pa'i ye shes de'i ye shes ni cho ga bzhin du'o //
translated: The rite is that which is performed according to the rite, and that is the intuition of one‚Äôs own intuition of pure awareness.

original: 'dis ni lha'i rnam par dag pa yang de rab tu gsal ba'i mtshan nyid rang bzhin gyis dag pa chos bzhin du yin pa 'dis lha nyid kyi rnam par dag pa gnyi ga yongs su dag pa'i dbang bskur ba rnams so //
analyzed: 'dis ni lha'i rnam par dag pa yang de rab tu gsal ba'i mtshan nyid rang bzhin gyis dag pa chos bzhin du yin pa 'dis lha nyid kyi rnam par dag pa gnyi ga yongs su dag pa'i dbang bskur ba rnams so //
translated: This shows the purification of the deity, which is the characteristic of its manifestation as pure by nature, as it is in reality. This shows the purification of the deity itself, which is the purification of both.

original: sbyin pa ni yongs su spangs pa'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa ni yongs su spangs pa'o //
translated: Giving is the relinquishing.

original: rnam pa gnyi ga'i yang chags pa yongs su spangs pa yin pa'i don to //
analyzed: rnam pa gnyi ga'i yang chags pa yongs su spangs pa yin pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that both aspects are the relinquishing of attachment.

original: mchod dang gsol ba gdab pa nyid //
analyzed: mchod dang gsol ba gdab pa nyid //
translated: Worship and supplication

original: ji ltar bshad pa de bzhin 'dir //
analyzed: ji ltar bshad pa de bzhin 'dir //
translated: are just as explained.

original: zhes pa ni dbang bskur ba'i rim par phye ba las ji skad gsungs pa'i kun rdzob dang don dam pa dbyer med pas so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni dbang bskur ba'i rim par phye ba las ji skad gsungs pa'i kun rdzob dang don dam pa dbyer med pas so //
translated: This is the consecration of both aspects, by means of the indivisibility of the conventional and the ultimate, as explained in the section on the stages of consecration.

original: mchod dang gsol ba gdab pa nyid //
analyzed: mchod dang gsol ba gdab pa nyid //
translated: Worship and supplication

original: de bzhin 'dir yang zhes pa ni /
analyzed: de bzhin 'dir yang zhes pa ni /
translated: Similarly here also.

original: bsam gtan gyis sngon du zhes pa ni /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyis sngon du zhes pa ni /
translated: By means of meditative concentration means

original: bsam gtan gyis sngon du rang gi snying gar rang gi sa bon las 'od zer nag po lcags kyu'i rnam pa'i gzugs kyis phyung nas des khams gsum du bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drangs la /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyis sngon du rang gi snying gar rang gi sa bon las 'od zer nag po lcags kyu'i rnam pa'i gzugs kyis phyung nas des khams gsum du bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drangs la /
translated: that by means of meditative concentration, having first emitted from one's own seed at one's heart a black light in the form of a hook, one invites all the Buddhas residing in the three realms.

original: ma mo brgyad kyis yang dag par mchod nas rjes su gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: ma mo brgyad kyis yang dag par mchod nas rjes su gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
translated: Having made offerings to the eight mothers, one should make a request.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag la dbang bskur du gsol zhes dbang bskur ba'i rim par phye ba nyid du bshad pa'i don to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag la dbang bskur du gsol zhes dbang bskur ba'i rim par phye ba nyid du bshad pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one should explain the stage of empowerment, saying, All TathƒÅgatas, please confer empowerment upon me.

original: de'i rjes thogs su 'phar ma gnyis bzang rnams bris nas //
analyzed: de'i rjes thogs su 'phar ma gnyis bzang rnams bris nas //

original: myur du dkar mo la sogs bri /
analyzed: myur du dkar mo la sogs bri /
translated: one should quickly draw the white ones and so forth.

original: de nas mchod pa dang gsol ba btab pa'i rjes thogs su dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas mchod pa dang gsol ba btab pa'i rjes thogs su dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
translated: Then, after making offerings and supplications, one should draw the ma·πá·∏çala.

original: de yang bzang ni rgyu bzang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang bzang ni rgyu bzang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Moreover, excellent means because of the excellent cause.

original: de rnams bris nas myur du ni //
analyzed: de rnams bris nas myur du ni //
translated: Having written those, quickly

original: myur ba nyid du dkar mo la sogs pa'i mtshan ma bri bar bya'o zhes pa ni man ngag go //
analyzed: myur ba nyid du dkar mo la sogs pa'i mtshan ma bri bar bya'o zhes pa ni man ngag go //
translated: one should quickly write the signs of Gaurƒ´, etc. This is the instruction.

original: shar du gri gug rnam par bri //
analyzed: shar du gri gug rnam par bri //
translated: In the east, a flaying knife is written,

original: lho dang nub tu de bzhin no //
analyzed: lho dang nub tu de bzhin no //
translated: in the south and west, likewise.

original: byang dang me yi mtshams dang ni //üîΩbden bral rlung du de bzhin no //
analyzed: byang dang me yi mtshams dang ni // bden bral rlung du de bzhin no //
translated: In the north and in the southeast,üîΩin the southwest and northwest,

original: dbang ldan du ni ci gsungs pa //
analyzed: dbang ldan du ni ci gsungs pa //
translated: in the northeast, as it is said,

original: de ltar de bzhin 'og dang steng //
analyzed: de ltar de bzhin 'og dang steng //

original: 'dis ni ci bstan nas /
analyzed: 'dis ni ci bstan nas /
translated: What is indicated by this?

original: nang gi rim pa'i lte bar rdo rje dang thod pa'o //
analyzed: nang gi rim pa'i lte bar rdo rje dang thod pa'o //
translated: In the center of the inner circle, a vajra and a skull.

original: 'dab ma bzhi la gri gug go //
analyzed: 'dab ma bzhi la gri gug go //

original: phyi rol gyi rim par yang 'dab ma brgyad rnams gri gug go //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi rim par yang 'dab ma brgyad rnams gri gug go //
translated: On the outer circle also, on the eight petals, flaying knives.

original: steng dang 'og tu yang bri bar bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: steng dang 'og tu yang bri bar bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one should write above and below as well.

original: yang na 'phar ma gnyis zhes pa ni kha sbyor ba ste /üîΩrdo rje 'dzin pa dang dbyer med pa nyid bdag med ma /
analyzed: yang na 'phar ma gnyis zhes pa ni kha sbyor ba ste / rdo rje 'dzin pa dang dbyer med pa nyid bdag med ma /
translated: Or, the two stories are the union.üîΩVajradhara is inseparable from NairƒÅtmya.

original: bdag med ma dang dbyer med pa nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa yin no //
analyzed: bdag med ma dang dbyer med pa nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa yin no //
translated: NairƒÅtmya is inseparable from Vajradhara.

original: de cis khyad 'phags @123a * //
analyzed: de cis khyad 'phags @123a * //
translated: Why is it superior?

original: she na ; / bzang ba ste bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: she na ; / bzang ba ste bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is good, that is, it is the nature of the two truths.

original: rnam bris nas ni nges pas brtan par bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam bris nas ni nges pas brtan par bya ba'o //
translated: Having drawn it, one should stabilize it with ascertainment.

original: myur ba zhes pa ni skad cig la'o //
analyzed: myur ba zhes pa ni skad cig la'o //
translated: Quickly means in an instant.

original: dkar mo la sogs pa'i mtshan ma bri ni brtan par bya ba'o /
analyzed: dkar mo la sogs pa'i mtshan ma bri ni brtan par bya ba'o /
translated: Having drawn the signs of Pukkasi and so on, one should stabilize it.üîΩWhat is that?

original: de ci yin pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ci yin pa gsungs pa /
translated: It is said:

original: shar du gri gug ste /
analyzed: shar du gri gug ste /
translated: In the east, a flaying knife.

original: lho dang nub dang byang dang me'i mtshams dang / bden bral dang rlung dang dbang ldan dang / 'og dang steng dang phyogs bcu rnams su'o //
analyzed: lho dang nub dang byang dang me'i mtshams dang / bden bral dang rlung dang dbang ldan dang / 'og dang steng dang phyogs bcu rnams su'o //
translated: In the south, west, north, southeast, northeast, northwest, southwest, below, above, and in the ten directions.

original: 'dis ni phyogs bcur 'khrul pa yang gnyis su med par rtogs pas 'khrul ba /
analyzed: 'dis ni phyogs bcur 'khrul pa yang gnyis su med par rtogs pas 'khrul ba /
translated: By this, one should understand that even the ten directions are nondual, and thus one should understand delusion.

original: nang gi rim par gnas pa'i mkha' 'gro ma bzhi bdag med ma dang lnga po de yang drug pa rdo rje 'dzin pa me long lta bu la sogs pa ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gzugs la sogs pa phung po lnga'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid yin no //
analyzed: nang gi rim par gnas pa'i mkha' 'gro ma bzhi bdag med ma dang lnga po de yang drug pa rdo rje 'dzin pa me long lta bu la sogs pa ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gzugs la sogs pa phung po lnga'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid yin no //
translated: The four dakinis who reside in the inner sequence, along with Nairatmya, are the nature of the sixth, the Vajra Holder, who is the nature of the five intuitions such as the mirror intuition, and the nature of the five aggregates such as form.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' bsnyems byas nas //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' bsnyems byas nas //
translated: Having arrogated the state of Vajrasattva,

original: rkang pa g-yas pa brkyang bya ste //
analyzed: rkang pa g-yas pa brkyang bya ste //
translated: one should extend the right foot,

original: dgyes rdor phyag gnyis rnal 'byor las //
analyzed: dgyes rdor phyag gnyis rnal 'byor las //
translated: and from the yoga of the two-armed Hevajra

original: slob dpon dkyil 'khor 'jug pa nyid ;
analyzed: slob dpon dkyil 'khor 'jug pa nyid ;
translated: the master should enter the mandala.

original: / ces pa ni gang gis rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du bsnyems par byas pa brtson 'grus spro ba de ni slob dpon te dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon ston pa'o //
analyzed: / ces pa ni gang gis rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du bsnyems par byas pa brtson 'grus spro ba de ni slob dpon te dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon ston pa'o //
translated: The master is the one who arrogates the state of Vajrasattva, who is diligent and enthusiastic. He is the mandala master, the teacher.

original: rkang pa g-yas pa brkyang bya ste //
analyzed: rkang pa g-yas pa brkyang bya ste //
translated: One should extend the right foot.

original: 'jug pa nyid ces pa ni /
analyzed: 'jug pa nyid ces pa ni /
translated: The entry is

original: rkang pa g-yas pa brkyang ba yin pa ste /
analyzed: rkang pa g-yas pa brkyang ba yin pa ste /
translated: the extension of the right foot.

original: 'di nyid kyi don 'di lung yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di nyid kyi don 'di lung yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is the meaning of this verse, because it is the scripture.

original: ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i bsnyems pa yin pa de gsungs pa /
analyzed: ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i bsnyems pa yin pa de gsungs pa /
translated: He states what the pride of Vajrasattva is.

original: phyag gnyis dgyes rdor rnal 'byor pas phyag gnyis pa'i dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gyis so //
analyzed: phyag gnyis dgyes rdor rnal 'byor pas phyag gnyis pa'i dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gyis so //
translated: With the yoga of two-armed Hevajra, with the yoga of two-armed Hevajra.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi skabs nyid kyis dkyil 'khor nyid du 'jug pa yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi skabs nyid kyis dkyil 'khor nyid du 'jug pa yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand that by the very occasion of the mandala, one enters into the mandala itself.

original: yang na rdo rje ni mi phyed pa'o //
analyzed: yang na rdo rje ni mi phyed pa'o //
translated: Or, a vajra is indivisible.

original: sems dpa' ni srid gsum gcig pa yin pas rdo rje sems dpa' sgras thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: sems dpa' ni srid gsum gcig pa yin pas rdo rje sems dpa' sgras thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
translated: A sattva is the unity of the three worlds, so the term Vajrasattva is the nondual pristine awareness of the inseparability of method and wisdom.

original: des byas nas ni thob nas so //
analyzed: des byas nas ni thob nas so //
translated: Having made that, having attained it.

original: bsnyems pa ni gang gis dge ba la spro ba'o //
analyzed: bsnyems pa ni gang gis dge ba la spro ba'o //
translated: Pride is that by which one is enthusiastic about virtue.

original: 'dis ni brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis gzhan gyi don dang spro bas rang gi don to //
analyzed: 'dis ni brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis gzhan gyi don dang spro bas rang gi don to //
translated: This is the benefit for others by the power of striving, and the benefit for oneself by enthusiasm.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin thob nas rang dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin thob nas rang dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'o //
translated: Having attained the nature of Vajrasattva, there is the perfection of one's own and others' goals.

original: slob dpon dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: slob dpon dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The master of the mandala is Vajradhara.

original: 'jug pa'o // gang du zhen rkang pa g-yas pa dag brkyang ste /
analyzed: 'jug pa'o // gang du zhen rkang pa g-yas pa dag brkyang ste /
translated: The entering is as follows: having extended the right foot,

original: g-yas brkyang nas 'khril pa'i zhabs gang dag rdo rje 'dzin pa dang / bdag med ma de dag gi zhabs @123b dag bdag med ma dang rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid gnyi ga'i ye shes bsdu ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: g-yas brkyang nas 'khril pa'i zhabs gang dag rdo rje 'dzin pa dang / bdag med ma de dag gi zhabs @123b dag bdag med ma dang rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid gnyi ga'i ye shes bsdu ba nyid yin no //
translated: the entwining feet of Vajradhara and Nairatmya, which are the feet of both of them, Nairatmya and Vajradhara, are the very gathering of the intuition of both of them.

original: 'di nyid ji ltar yin pa gsungs pa phyag gnyis kyi rdo rjer sbyor bas gnyis ni kun rdzob don dam pa dag go //
analyzed: 'di nyid ji ltar yin pa gsungs pa phyag gnyis kyi rdo rjer sbyor bas gnyis ni kun rdzob don dam pa dag go //
translated: It is said that this is just so: The two, the conventional and the ultimate, are the two arms, because of the union with the vajra of the two arms.

original: phyag ni longs spyod do //
analyzed: phyag ni longs spyod do //
translated: The arms are the enjoyments.

original: gang la dgyes rdor gnyis su med pa'i ye shes 'di phyag gnyis pa'i dgyes pa'i rdo rje'o //
analyzed: gang la dgyes rdor gnyis su med pa'i ye shes 'di phyag gnyis pa'i dgyes pa'i rdo rje'o //
translated: The two-armed Hevajra is the Hevajra of the intuition of the non-dual Hevajra.

original: de'i sbyor bas ni de'i gzugs las te /
analyzed: de'i sbyor bas ni de'i gzugs las te /
translated: By the union with that form,

original: de nyid kyi phyir byas nas te thob nas ma ning yan pa'i don to //üîΩkhrus dang gtsang sbra dri zhim lus //üîΩsna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir byas nas te thob nas ma ning yan pa'i don to // khrus dang gtsang sbra dri zhim lus // sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan //
translated: from that, having made, having attained, the neuter, the meaning of the a is complete.

original: h'um h'um bsnyems pa byas nas ni //
analyzed: h'um h'um bsnyems pa byas nas ni //
