analyzed: des na gcig pa ni dbyer med pa'i sku ste gang la sku yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the single body is the body of inseparability, and it is so called because it exists in the body.

original: yang na sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gcig pa ni dbyer med pa'o //
analyzed: yang na sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gcig pa ni dbyer med pa'o //
translated: Or else, the single body of all buddhas is the inseparability of the two.

original: des na 'dzin pa chags pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba gang la yod pa de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gcig pa ste /
analyzed: des na 'dzin pa chags pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba gang la yod pa de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gcig pa ste /
translated: Therefore, the single body of all buddhas is the body of the ultimate truth, which is free from the characteristic of attachment to grasping.

original: thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa nyid kyis don dam pa'i bden pa'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa nyid kyis don dam pa'i bden pa'i bdag nyid do //
translated: It is the nature of the ultimate truth by the inseparability of means and intuition.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gcig pa nyid kyis kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gcig pa nyid kyis kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i bdag nyid do //
translated: It is the nature of the relative truth by the single body of all buddhas.

original: 'dis ni bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid kyi bcom ldan 'das nyid rig pa mchog yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid kyi bcom ldan 'das nyid rig pa mchog yin no //
translated: This is the supreme knowledge of the Blessed One himself, who is the nature of the two truths.

original: ci gsungs sbyin sreg byas nas ni //
analyzed: ci gsungs sbyin sreg byas nas ni //
translated: Having performed the fire sacrifice as stated,üîΩhaving erected the holy mandala,üîΩhaving purified the images in the evening,

original: dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhengs pa dang // dgongs ka sku rnams sbyang ba dang // sta gon la sogs byas nas ni //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhengs pa dang // dgongs ka sku rnams sbyang ba dang // sta gon la sogs byas nas ni //
translated: having performed the consecration, and so on,

original: nyi ma phyed na bgegs nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir ji skad gsungs pa'i sbyin sreg byas nas tshogs dkyil 'khor bzhengs su gsol lo //
analyzed: nyi ma phyed na bgegs nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir ji skad gsungs pa'i sbyin sreg byas nas tshogs dkyil 'khor bzhengs su gsol lo //
translated: at noon, for the sake of pacifying obstacles, one should perform the fire sacrifice as stated, and request the assembly to erect the mandala.

original: dgongs ka ni phyi dro'i dus so //
analyzed: dgongs ka ni phyi dro'i dus so //
translated: Evening is the time of afternoon.

original: sta gon la sogs byas nas ni //
analyzed: sta gon la sogs byas nas ni //
translated: Having performed the consecration, and so on,

original: zhes pa ni sngags dang phyag rgya la sogs @134b pa dgod cing mchod yon dang zhabs bsil la sogs pa dang me tog dang bdug pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod de /
analyzed: zhes pa ni sngags dang phyag rgya la sogs @134b pa dgod cing mchod yon dang zhabs bsil la sogs pa dang me tog dang bdug pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod de /
translated: having arranged the mantras, mudras, and so on, and having worshipped with the offerings of water for the feet, flowers, incense, and so on,

original: sta gon du gnas pa la sogs pa de byas nas rim pa 'dis lugs ma 'dus bya'o //
analyzed: sta gon du gnas pa la sogs pa de byas nas rim pa 'dis lugs ma 'dus bya'o //
translated: having performed that consecration, and so on, one should worship the assembled images by this procedure.

original: nam mkhar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kun //
analyzed: nam mkhar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kun //
translated: All the Buddhas dwelling in space,

original: sku gzugs snying gar rab tu gzhug / rang 'dod lha mnyam rnal 'byor ba //
analyzed: sku gzugs snying gar rab tu gzhug / rang 'dod lha mnyam rnal 'byor ba //
translated: the yogi equal to the desired deity,

original: rtogs ldan sngags kyi pha rol son //
analyzed: rtogs ldan sngags kyi pha rol son //
translated: knowing the ritual, perfected in mantra.

original: tho rangs snga bar lha rab tu gnas pa bya ste /
analyzed: tho rangs snga bar lha rab tu gnas pa bya ste /
translated: The consecration of the deity should be done in the early morning.

original: lha dbang bskur ba'i rim par phye ba ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams spyan drang ba de bzhin du rim pas spyan drangs nas mchod de de lugs ma'i snying gar gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: lha dbang bskur ba'i rim par phye ba ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams spyan drang ba de bzhin du rim pas spyan drangs nas mchod de de lugs ma'i snying gar gzhug par bya'o //
translated: Just as the TathƒÅgatas are invited according to the stages of the consecration of the deity, having invited in that way, having worshipped, one should place it in the heart of the painting.

original: slob dpon de yang cis khyad par du 'phags she na /
analyzed: slob dpon de yang cis khyad par du 'phags she na /
translated: How is that master distinguished?

original: rang 'dod lha mnyam rnal 'byor ba'o //
analyzed: rang 'dod lha mnyam rnal 'byor ba'o //
translated: The yogi equal to the desired deity.

original: 'dis ci bstan na gang rang gi 'dod pa'i lha thabs dang shes rab kyi rgyud kyi rim pas gsungs pa de'i mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: 'dis ci bstan na gang rang gi 'dod pa'i lha thabs dang shes rab kyi rgyud kyi rim pas gsungs pa de'i mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'o //
translated: What does this teach? He is endowed with the yoga of equality with that desired deity taught in the tantras of method and wisdom.

original: rtogs ldan zhes pa ni cho gshes pa'o //
analyzed: rtogs ldan zhes pa ni cho gshes pa'o //
translated: Knowing the ritual means knowing the ritual.

original: sngags kyi pha rol son zhes pa ni /
analyzed: sngags kyi pha rol son zhes pa ni /
translated: Perfected in mantra means

original: sngags kyi de kho na nyid ma lus par shes pa'o //
analyzed: sngags kyi de kho na nyid ma lus par shes pa'o //
translated: knowing the reality of mantra in its entirety.

original: yang na lugs ma ni sku gzugs so //
analyzed: yang na lugs ma ni sku gzugs so //
translated: Or else, the image is the statue.

original: sbyangs pa ni 'dus byas pa'o //
analyzed: sbyangs pa ni 'dus byas pa'o //
translated: The purified is the conditioned.

original: 'jim pa la sogs pa'am lugs ma de'i thugs kar gzhug par bya'o ni gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: 'jim pa la sogs pa'am lugs ma de'i thugs kar gzhug par bya'o ni gzhug par bya'o //
translated: It should be placed in the heart of the clay or metal image.

original: gang zhe na sangs rgyas te /
analyzed: gang zhe na sangs rgyas te /
translated: What? The Buddhas.

original: me long lta bu la sogs pa ye shes lnga dang sku gsum dang thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin rnams kyi ye shes rnams so //
analyzed: me long lta bu la sogs pa ye shes lnga dang sku gsum dang thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin rnams kyi ye shes rnams so //
translated: The wisdoms of the five wisdoms such as the mirror-like, of the three bodies, and of the nature of method and wisdom.

original: ci khyad par du 'phags she na /
analyzed: ci khyad par du 'phags she na /
translated: How is it exalted?

original: nam mkhar bzhugs pa ste sgrib pa med pa'i rang bzhin du rnam par gnas so //
analyzed: nam mkhar bzhugs pa ste sgrib pa med pa'i rang bzhin du rnam par gnas so //
translated: It abides in the sky, in the nature of non-obstruction.

original: nges pa ni nges pa'i don te 'di la the tshom med pa nyid do zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: nges pa ni nges pa'i don te 'di la the tshom med pa nyid do zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The certain is the definitive meaning, which is the absence of doubt in this.

original: rang 'dod lha mnyam rnal 'byor pa ni /
analyzed: rang 'dod lha mnyam rnal 'byor pa ni /
translated: The yogi who is equal to the desired deity

original: rang gi sems 'dod pa'i lha ste des gang btsal ba'i lha de ni me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes lnga rnams so //
analyzed: rang gi sems 'dod pa'i lha ste des gang btsal ba'i lha de ni me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes lnga rnams so //
translated: is the mind that desires the deity. The deity that it seeks is the five wisdoms such as the mirror-like.

original: rang yang yin la 'dod pa'i lha yang yin pas na rang gi 'dod lha dag go //
analyzed: rang yang yin la 'dod pa'i lha yang yin pas na rang gi 'dod lha dag go //
translated: He is himself, and he is the desired god, thus he is the desired god.

original: de dag mnyam pa ni kun nas kun du rnal 'byor yod pas ni rang 'dod lha mnyam rnal 'byor ba'o //
analyzed: de dag mnyam pa ni kun nas kun du rnal 'byor yod pas ni rang 'dod lha mnyam rnal 'byor ba'o //
translated: He is the same as them, and he is the yoga, thus he is the yoga of the desired god.

original: 'dis ni thugs rdo rje gcig pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: 'dis ni thugs rdo rje gcig pa'i sku'o //
translated: This is the body of the single vajra of mind.

original: rtogs ldan zhes pa 'dis ni kun du snang ba'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir sku'i rdo rje gcig pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: rtogs ldan zhes pa 'dis ni kun du snang ba'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir sku'i rdo rje gcig pa'i sku'o //
translated: This ‚Äúendowed with realization‚Äù is the body of the single vajra of body, because it has the nature of the universal manifestation.

original: sngags kyi pha rol son zhes pa 'dis ni rdo rje'i sku'o //üîΩ'dis ni rdo rje @135a * //
analyzed: sngags kyi pha rol son zhes pa 'dis ni rdo rje'i sku'o // 'dis ni rdo rje @135a * //
translated: This ‚Äúperfected in mantra‚Äù is the vajra body.üîΩThis is the body of the single vajra of the three vajras.

original: gsum gcig pa'i sku nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin gyi rnal 'byor pa des shing dang rdo ba la sogs pa'i lugs ma la sogs pa ye shes kyi rang bzhin du bya bar bzod pa yin no //
analyzed: gsum gcig pa'i sku nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin gyi rnal 'byor pa des shing dang rdo ba la sogs pa'i lugs ma la sogs pa ye shes kyi rang bzhin du bya bar bzod pa yin no //
translated: The yogi who has the nature of Vajradhara is patient with the transformation of wood, stone, and so forth into the nature of gnosis.

original: rab gnas ni so so so so'i zhing gnas pas rab gnas te thams cad ye shes su bzhugs par bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rab gnas ni so so so so'i zhing gnas pas rab gnas te thams cad ye shes su bzhugs par bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúConsecration‚Äù means that each one is consecrated by abiding in its own place, which means that all should abide in gnosis.

original: me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa bstan pa /üîΩaom badzra pushpe a'a: h'um sv'a h'a /
analyzed: me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa bstan pa / aom badzra pushpe a'a: h'um sv'a h'a /
translated: is taught.üîΩO·πÉ vajra pu·π£pe a·∏• h≈´·πÉ svƒÅhƒÅ.

analyzed: aom badzra dh'u pe a'a: h'um sv'a h'a / aom badzra d'i pe a'a: h'um sv'a h'a /

original: aom badzra gandhe a'a: h'um sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom badzra gandhe a'a: h'um sv'a h'a /
translated: O·πÉ vajra gandhe a·∏• h≈´·πÉ svƒÅhƒÅ.

original: aom badzra nee bi dye a'a: h'um sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom badzra nee bi dye a'a: h'um sv'a h'a /
translated: O·πÉ vajra naividye a·∏• h≈´·πÉ svƒÅhƒÅ.

original: rim pa 'dis me tog dang bdug pa dang mar me dang dri dang zhal zas rnams nye bar dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: rim pa 'dis me tog dang bdug pa dang mar me dang dri dang zhal zas rnams nye bar dbul bar bya'o //
translated: By this sequence, one should offer flowers, incense, lamps, perfume, and food.

original: cis khyad 'phags she na /
analyzed: cis khyad 'phags she na /
translated: How is it distinguished?

original: sna tshogs h'um las bskyed pa'i zhes pa ste /
analyzed: sna tshogs h'um las bskyed pa'i zhes pa ste /
translated: It is said, ‚Äúarisen from the various h≈´·πÉs.‚Äù

original: yi ge h'um gi so bon rnams las me tog la sogs pa rnams dngos su yod pa'am /
analyzed: yi ge h'um gi so bon rnams las me tog la sogs pa rnams dngos su yod pa'am /
translated: The flowers, etc. are actually present from the seed syllables of the letter h≈´·πÉ,

original: blos bskyed par bya'o zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: blos bskyed par bya'o zhes dgongs so //
translated: or they are generated by the mind.üîΩThis is the intention.

original: yi ge h'um sna tshogs las byung ba'i me tog la sogs pa yang dbul bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: yi ge h'um sna tshogs las byung ba'i me tog la sogs pa yang dbul bar bya ba'o //
translated: The flowers, etc. arisen from the various letters h≈´·πÉ are also to be offered.

original: yang na sna tshogs h'um las bskyed pa'i zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin rnams kyi me tog dang / bdug pa dang mar me dang / dri dang / zhal zas rnams dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: yang na sna tshogs h'um las bskyed pa'i zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin rnams kyi me tog dang / bdug pa dang mar me dang / dri dang / zhal zas rnams dbul bar bya'o //
translated: Or else, ‚Äúgenerated from the various h≈´·πÉs‚Äù means that one should offer the flowers, incense, lamps, perfume, and food of the natures of the five tathƒÅgatas.

original: 'di'i rang bzhin du lugs ma la sogs pa bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'di'i rang bzhin du lugs ma la sogs pa bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúmade‚Äù is that one should make the images, etc.

original: badzra pushpe zhes pa ni dbyer med pa'i ye shes so ;
analyzed: badzra pushpe zhes pa ni dbyer med pa'i ye shes so ;
translated: ‚Äú Vajra pu·π£pe‚Äù is the gnosis of indivisibility.

original: / de nyid rdo rje gsum dbyer med par gsungs so //üîΩaom a'a: h'um sv'a h'a /
analyzed: / de nyid rdo rje gsum dbyer med par gsungs so // aom a'a: h'um sv'a h'a /
translated: That itself is said to be the indivisibility of the three vajras.

original: zhes pa ni ye shes lnga rnams kyi thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid do //
analyzed: zhes pa ni ye shes lnga rnams kyi thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid do //
translated: ‚Äú O·πÉ ƒÅ·∏• h≈´·πÉ svƒÅhƒÅ‚Äù is the nature of method and wisdom of the five gnoses.

original: de ltar badzra dh'u pe la sogs pa rnams kyi yang bshad pa 'di yin no //
analyzed: de ltar badzra dh'u pe la sogs pa rnams kyi yang bshad pa 'di yin no //
translated: This is the explanation of ‚Äúvajra dh≈´pe,‚Äù etc.

original: gong ma'i rgyud kyi chog rim pas //
analyzed: gong ma'i rgyud kyi chog rim pas //
translated: The sequence of the ritual of the higher tantra

original: mchod yon zhabs bsil gong ma bzhin //
analyzed: mchod yon zhabs bsil gong ma bzhin //
translated: is like the previous one for the offering water and foot water.

original: mchod yon la sogs pa byas nas dbul zhing blugs par bya'o //
analyzed: mchod yon la sogs pa byas nas dbul zhing blugs par bya'o //
translated: Having performed the offering water, etc., one should offer and pour them.

original: snga ma bzhin ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: ‚Äú Like the previous one‚Äù is like the previous one.

original: snga ma'i rgyud kyi sgras ni de kho na bsdus pa'i rgyud la sogs pas gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: snga ma'i rgyud kyi sgras ni de kho na bsdus pa'i rgyud la sogs pas gsungs pa'o //
translated: The former tantras are those taught in the Tattvasamgraha Tantra and so forth.

original: cho ga rim pas ni rim pas te dung chos la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod yon dang zhabs bsil la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: cho ga rim pas ni rim pas te dung chos la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod yon dang zhabs bsil la sogs pa'o //
translated: The sequence of rites is the sequence of the rites of offering water for welcoming, water for the feet, and so forth, with conches and so forth.

original: yang na zhabs bsil ni ye shes so //
analyzed: yang na zhabs bsil ni ye shes so //
translated: Alternatively, the water for the feet is gnosis.

original: de nyid dang po ni gtso bo'o //
analyzed: de nyid dang po ni gtso bo'o //
translated: That itself is primary.

original: mchod yon ni mchod yon chen po rnyed dka' ba'i mchod yon dang zhabs bsil la sogs pa de sngar gyi rgyud bzhin du'o //
analyzed: mchod yon ni mchod yon chen po rnyed dka' ba'i mchod yon dang zhabs bsil la sogs pa de sngar gyi rgyud bzhin du'o //
translated: The water for welcoming is the great water for welcoming, the difficult-to-find water for welcoming, and so forth, as in the former tantras.

original: cho ga'i rim pa ni sngar bye brag tu bshad pa'i cho ga rnyed pa'i ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gyis zhes pa'i don @135b to ;
analyzed: cho ga'i rim pa ni sngar bye brag tu bshad pa'i cho ga rnyed pa'i ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gyis zhes pa'i don @135b to ;
translated: The sequence of rites is the sequence of rites explained above, with the nature of the five gnoses.

original: / sbyin sreg gi don gyi thab khung gsungs pa /
analyzed: / sbyin sreg gi don gyi thab khung gsungs pa /
translated: The hearth for the purpose of fire sacrifice is stated:

original: zhi bar thab khung zlum po nyid //
analyzed: zhi bar thab khung zlum po nyid //
translated: For pacification, the hearth is round.

original: rgyas pa nyid kyi gru bzhi pa //
analyzed: rgyas pa nyid kyi gru bzhi pa //
translated: For increase, it is square.

original: gsad pa la ni gru gsum brjod //
analyzed: gsad pa la ni gru gsum brjod //
translated: For killing, it is said to be triangular.

original: 'di nyid la ni lhag ma bsgrub //
analyzed: 'di nyid la ni lhag ma bsgrub //
translated: For this very [purpose], the remaining [hearths] are accomplished.

original: 'di nyid la zhes pa ni gru gsum nyid la'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid la zhes pa ni gru gsum nyid la'o //
translated: Here, this refers to the triangle.

original: lhag ma zhes pa ni mngon spyod la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: lhag ma zhes pa ni mngon spyod la sogs pa'o //
translated: The remainder refers to the rites of assault, etc.

original: bsgrub par bya ba ni rdzogs par bya ba'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba ni rdzogs par bya ba'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The accomplishment is the completion.

original: yang na zlum po zhes pa ni mnyam pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang na zlum po zhes pa ni mnyam pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Or, circle is because of equality.

original: gru bzhi zhes pa ni de nyid ye shes bzhi'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: gru bzhi zhes pa ni de nyid ye shes bzhi'i bdag nyid do //
translated: The square is because of the nature of the four intuitions.

original: gru gsum zhes pa ni rdo rje gsum gyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: gru gsum zhes pa ni rdo rje gsum gyi rang bzhin no //
translated: The triangle is because of the nature of the three vajras.

original: lhag ma zhes pa ni ye shes lnga la sogs pa ma lus pa rnams so //
analyzed: lhag ma zhes pa ni ye shes lnga la sogs pa ma lus pa rnams so //
translated: The remainder refers to all the five intuitions, etc.

original: bsgrub ni yang dag par grub par bya ba'i don to //üîΩthab khung gi tshad gsungs pa //
analyzed: bsgrub ni yang dag par grub par bya ba'i don to // thab khung gi tshad gsungs pa //
translated: The accomplishment is the meaning of the perfect accomplishment.üîΩThe measure of the hearth is stated:

original: khru gang dang ni khru phyed nyid //
analyzed: khru gang dang ni khru phyed nyid //
translated: One cubit and a half

original: zhi ba'i steng dang 'og tu yin //
analyzed: zhi ba'i steng dang 'og tu yin //
translated: is for the upper and lower pacification.

original: zhi ba'i thab khung ni rgyar khru gang zabs su mtho gang gi tshad do //
analyzed: zhi ba'i thab khung ni rgyar khru gang zabs su mtho gang gi tshad do //
translated: The hearth for pacification is one cubit across and one cubit deep.

original: khru ngo dang ni khru gang nyid //
analyzed: khru ngo dang ni khru gang nyid //
translated: One cubit and one cubit

original: rgyas pa'i rgya dang zabs su brjod //
analyzed: rgyas pa'i rgya dang zabs su brjod //
translated: is declared for the width and depth of the prosperity [hearth].

original: 'di ni rgyas pa'i thab khung gi tshad yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni rgyas pa'i thab khung gi tshad yin no //
translated: This is the measure of the hearth for prosperity.

original: sor mo nyi shu 'am de yi phyed /
analyzed: sor mo nyi shu 'am de yi phyed /
translated: Twenty fingers or half of that

original: gsad pa'i steng dang zabs su 'dod //
analyzed: gsad pa'i steng dang zabs su 'dod //
translated: is considered the depth and width of the hearth for killing.

original: 'di ni gsad pa'i thab khung gi tshad do //
analyzed: 'di ni gsad pa'i thab khung gi tshad do //
translated: This is the measure of the hearth for killing.

original: thab khung gi kha dog gsungs pa //
analyzed: thab khung gi kha dog gsungs pa //
translated: The color of the hearth is stated:

original: zhi bar kha dog dkar por 'gyur //
analyzed: zhi bar kha dog dkar por 'gyur //
translated: For pacification, it should be white;

original: rgyas par ser po de bzhin no //
analyzed: rgyas par ser po de bzhin no //
translated: for prosperity, likewise, it should be yellow.

original: gsad pa la ni kha dog gnag / dbang la dmar por rab tu grags //
analyzed: gsad pa la ni kha dog gnag / dbang la dmar por rab tu grags //
translated: For killing, it should be black; for subjugation, it is well known to be red.üîΩJust as for subjugation, so also for summoning,

original: dbang la ji bzhin de ltar dgug / gsad la ji ltar sdang la sogs //
analyzed: dbang la ji bzhin de ltar dgug / gsad la ji ltar sdang la sogs //
translated: and for killing, as for enmity, and so on.

original: gsad pa la thab khung gru gsusm pa bya ste /

translated: Moreover, the non-existence of the other is the non-existence of the solitary, i.e., the non-existence of the duality, the meaning of which is freedom from eternalism and nihilism.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rang gzhan don ni rab grub phyir te rang ni sems so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rang gzhan don ni rab grub phyir te rang ni sems so //
translated: Therefore, for the sake of the accomplishment of one's own and others' goals, one's own is mind,

original: gzhan ni dbang po dang yul lo //
analyzed: gzhan ni dbang po dang yul lo //
translated: and others are the sense faculties and their objects.

original: de rnams kyi don ni rang gzhan don to ;
analyzed: de rnams kyi don ni rang gzhan don to ;
translated: Their goal is one's own and others' goals.

original: / de'i rab grub phyir ni mchog gi dngos grub bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: / de'i rab grub phyir ni mchog gi dngos grub bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For the sake of their accomplishment is for the sake of the supreme accomplishment.

original: lan cig ni skad cig gcig tsam nyid du'o //
analyzed: lan cig ni skad cig gcig tsam nyid du'o //
translated: Once is for just an instant.

original: goms byas pas ni thams cad du khyab pa'i nges pa nyid do //
analyzed: goms byas pas ni thams cad du khyab pa'i nges pa nyid do //
translated: By practice is for the certainty of the all-pervasiveness.

original: rig ma ni bdag med ma'o //
analyzed: rig ma ni bdag med ma'o //
translated: The knowledge consort is NairƒÅtmya.

original: 'phral du ni de'i med la'o //
analyzed: 'phral du ni de'i med la'o //
translated: Immediately is in the absence of that.

original: mngon du byed par 'gyur ni nyams su myong bar byed @140b pa'o ;
analyzed: mngon du byed par 'gyur ni nyams su myong bar byed @140b pa'o ;
translated: One will manifest is one will experience.

original: / skad cig ma gcig la mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ye shes su bstan pa yang no //
analyzed: / skad cig ma gcig la mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ye shes su bstan pa yang no //
translated: The demonstration of the gnosis of the vajra holder as the perfect enlightenment in a single instant is also complete.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Therefore,

original: 'jigs pa smyo ba sdug bsngal dang // mya ngan gdung ba 'tshe ba dang // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ches //
analyzed: 'jigs pa smyo ba sdug bsngal dang // mya ngan gdung ba 'tshe ba dang // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ches //

original: sgrub pa po nyid nyon mi mongs //
analyzed: sgrub pa po nyid nyon mi mongs //

original: 'jigs pa ni 'chi ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal lo //
analyzed: 'jigs pa ni 'chi ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal lo //

original: smyo ba ni g-yengs ba'o //
analyzed: smyo ba ni g-yengs ba'o //

analyzed: sdug bsngal ni lus can gyi 'bras dang shu ba la sogs pa'i zug ngu'o //

analyzed: gdung ba dang de la sogs pas 'tshe ba dang / 'dod chags dang zhe sdang la sogs pa rnams kyis so //

analyzed: nyon mi mongs ni nyon mi mongs pas mi 'chings pa ste //

original: kun du mnyam par 'dod pa de'i phyir zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: kun du mnyam par 'dod pa de'i phyir zhes dgongs so //

analyzed: yang na sgrub pa po ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //

analyzed: 'dod chags ni 'od dpag tu med pa gsung rdo rje'o //

original: zhe sdang ni mi bskyod pa thugs rdo rje'o //
analyzed: zhe sdang ni mi bskyod pa thugs rdo rje'o //
translated: Hatred is Ak·π£obhya, the vajra of mind.

analyzed: gti mug che ni rnam par snang mdzad sku rdo rje'o //

original: rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'i rgyu de rnams kyis zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'i rgyu de rnams kyis zhes pa'i don to //

analyzed: 'jigs dang mya ngan ni gti mug chen po'i rnam par dag pa'o //

original: gdung ba dang smyo ba ni 'dod chags rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: gdung ba dang smyo ba ni 'dod chags rnam par dag pa'o //

analyzed: sdug bsngal dang 'tshe ba ni zhe sdang rnam par dag pa'o //

original: 'jigs pa dang mya ngan ni gti mug chen po rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnam par dag pa zhes pa 'dis ni rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa yin no //
analyzed: 'jigs pa dang mya ngan ni gti mug chen po rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnam par dag pa zhes pa 'dis ni rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa yin no //

analyzed: gdung ba dang smyo ba ni 'dod chags rnam par dag pa 'od dpag tu med pa'i rnam par dag pa'o //

analyzed: de bzhin du sdug bsngal dang 'tshe ba ni zhes sdang mi bskyod pa'i rnam par dag pa'o //

original: dgu'i bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: dgu'i bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor ro //

original: nyon mongs pa spangs pa ni bag chags spang bar gsungs pa /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa spangs pa ni bag chags spang bar gsungs pa /

analyzed: phan dang gnod pa'i 'bras 'byung bar //

analyzed: de ltar nges par shes nas ni // ji ltar de ni skad cig kyang //
translated: Having understood it thus,

original: rnal 'byor du 'bod mi gnas so //
analyzed: rnal 'byor du 'bod mi gnas so //
translated: how is it that the yogi does not remain even for an instantüîΩin the hell of the Wailing?

analyzed: de lta bu'i rim pas mi phan pa nyid phan pa ste phan pa dang mi phan pa de nyid kyi 'bras bu 'byung ba'o //

analyzed: de lta bu'i rim pa shes par byas nas so //

original: nges pa ni nges pa'o //
analyzed: nges pa ni nges pa'o //

original: ji ltar zhe na /üîΩde ni @141a * //
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na / de ni @141a * //
translated: That

original: skad cig kyang de skad cig tu du 'bod du 'gro ba ste /

analyzed: 'on kyang de ltar shes par byas pa'i rig pas ni du 'bod nyid du cung zad kyang 'gro ba ma yin te /
translated: However, the knowledge that knows it in that way does not go anywhere at all, not even to the hell of Sa·πÉjƒ´va.

analyzed: thams cad nyid dge ba dang mi dge ba cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no //

analyzed: gcig ni gnyis su med pa'o //

analyzed: skad cig ces pa ni bzhi pa lhan cig skyes pa'o //

analyzed: phan dang gnod pa'i 'bras 'byung ni phan pa ni spangs pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir bdag med ma'o //

analyzed: mi phan pa ni ma spangs pa'i rang bzhin nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //

analyzed: gnyi ga dbyer med pa ni 'bras bu 'byung ba'o //

analyzed: nges pa ni nges pa'o //

analyzed: rnal 'byor pa ni gnyis su med par rtag par gnas pa'o //

original: ji ltar zhe na /

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /

analyzed: mtshams med lnga ni byed pa dang // srog chags gsod la dga' gang dang // gzhan yang skye ba dman pa dang // rmongs dang ma rungs las byed dang // gzugs ngan yan lag ma tshang ba //

analyzed: de dag gis kyang bsams pas 'grub //

translated: Or, ‚Äúmine‚Äù is the nature of the indivisible Vajra Holder.

original: lha dang lha min mi rnams dang / bkug la zhes pa ni lha ni dbang po rnams so //
analyzed: lha dang lha min mi rnams dang / bkug la zhes pa ni lha ni dbang po rnams so //
translated: ‚ÄúHaving summoned gods, demigods, and humans‚Äù means that the gods are the sense powers.

original: lha ma yin ni yul rnams so //
analyzed: lha ma yin ni yul rnams so //
translated: The demigods are the objects.

original: mi ni rnam par shes pa mkha' 'gro ma bco lnga rnams so //
analyzed: mi ni rnam par shes pa mkha' 'gro ma bco lnga rnams so //
translated: Humans are the fifteen dakinis of consciousness.

original: bkug pa ni bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: bkug pa ni bsdus pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúSummoned‚Äù is ‚Äúgathered.‚Äù

original: gnod sbyin mo ni cha med pa'i rang bzhin rnams so //üîΩmi 'am ci las kyang ni kyang gi sgra khyad par gyi don to //
analyzed: gnod sbyin mo ni cha med pa'i rang bzhin rnams so // mi 'am ci las kyang ni kyang gi sgra khyad par gyi don to //
translated: The yakshini is the nature of the partless.üîΩ‚ÄúAnd kinnara‚Äù is the word ‚Äúand‚Äù for the purpose of distinction.

original: mi 'am ci las zhes pa ni ci'i sgras ma ning ngo //
analyzed: mi 'am ci las zhes pa ni ci'i sgras ma ning ngo //
translated: ‚ÄúFrom kinnara‚Äù is ‚Äúfrom what,‚Äù the word ‚Äúwhat‚Äù being neuter.

original: de lta bu'i rang bzhin gyi bud med las ma ning gi rang bzhin gyi rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bu'i rang bzhin gyi bud med las ma ning gi rang bzhin gyi rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyur ro //
translated: From a woman of such a nature, a neuter nature vajra holder is the cause.

original: de yang khyer la spyod pa spyad //
analyzed: de yang khyer la spyod pa spyad //
translated: Also, taking her, one should practice.

original: bdag gi dal ba mngon bya'i phyir //
analyzed: bdag gi dal ba mngon bya'i phyir //
translated: For the sake of manifesting one's own opportunity.

original: phyag rgya de khyer nas spyod pa spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya de khyer nas spyod pa spyad par bya'o //
translated: Taking that consort, one should practice.

original: ji ltar zhe na bdag gi ngal ba mngon bya'i phyir //
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na bdag gi ngal ba mngon bya'i phyir //
translated: How? For the sake of manifesting one's own opportunity.

original: bdag nyid rtog pa brtan par spyod pa bya ba yin par dgongs so //
analyzed: bdag nyid rtog pa brtan par spyod pa bya ba yin par dgongs so //
translated: It is intended that one should practice with firm imagination.

original: yang na spyod pa ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa dbyer med spyod pa'o //
analyzed: yang na spyod pa ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa dbyer med spyod pa'o //
translated: Or, practice is the practice of the inseparability of the conventional and the ultimate.

original: spyod ni shes pa'o //
analyzed: spyod ni shes pa'o //
translated: Practice is knowledge.

original: de yang ni phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: de yang ni phyag rgya'o //
translated: And that is the consort.

original: khyer la ni goms pa'o //
analyzed: khyer la ni goms pa'o //
translated: Taking is familiarization.

original: bdag gis ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: bdag gis ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i 'o //
translated: One's own is of the vajra holder.

original: dal ba mngon bya'i phyir ni ye shes de las shes pa'i don to //
analyzed: dal ba mngon bya'i phyir ni ye shes de las shes pa'i don to //
translated: For the sake of manifesting is the meaning of knowledge from that wisdom.

original: gang phyag rgya khyer nas spyod pa de longs spyod ma yin par ci tshugs kyang grol ba'i phyir yin pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: gang phyag rgya khyer nas spyod pa de longs spyod ma yin par ci tshugs kyang grol ba'i phyir yin pa gsungs pa /
translated: It is said that one who takes the consort and practices is not a consumer, but is liberated.

original: spyod pa longs spyod phyir ma gsungs /
analyzed: spyod pa longs spyod phyir ma gsungs /
translated: The conduct is not taught for the sake of enjoyment.

original: gang bshad 'jig pa'i gzugs can gyis //
analyzed: gang bshad 'jig pa'i gzugs can gyis //
translated: Whatever is explained by the one who has the form of destruction,

original: yid ni brtan rnam g-ye'am ci //
analyzed: yid ni brtan rnam g-ye'am ci //
translated: is the mind stable or distracted?üîΩOne should examine one's own mind.

original: rang gi sems ni so sor brtag / gang 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad las rnam par grol ba'i spyod pa 'jigs pa de la longs spyod la 'dod pas ma yin pa ci tshugs kyang thar pa'i don du yin par dgongs so //
analyzed: rang gi sems ni so sor brtag / gang 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad las rnam par grol ba'i spyod pa 'jigs pa de la longs spyod la 'dod pas ma yin pa ci tshugs kyang thar pa'i don du yin par dgongs so //
translated: The conduct that is liberated from the eight worldly dharmas is not for the sake of enjoying desires, but rather for the sake of liberation.

original: yang na spyod pa gang bshad 'jigs pa'i gzugs can gyis /
analyzed: yang na spyod pa gang bshad 'jigs pa'i gzugs can gyis /
translated: Or, whatever conduct is explained by the one who has the form of destruction,

original: bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid kyi bya ba gang de bshad pa ni brjod pa'i spyod yul ma yin te /
analyzed: bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid kyi bya ba gang de bshad pa ni brjod pa'i spyod yul ma yin te /
translated: whatever action that has the nature of the two truths is not the object of expression,

original: gang gi spyod yul las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi spyod yul las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it transcends the domain of expression.

original: de ni longs spyod du med par bshad pa ste gzod ma nas lhun gyis grub pa yin pa'i don to //
analyzed: de ni longs spyod du med par bshad pa ste gzod ma nas lhun gyis grub pa yin pa'i don to //
translated: That is explained as not being enjoyed, meaning that it is primordially spontaneous.

original: da ni phyag rgya grub par bya ba'i phyir phyag rgya khyer nas spyod pa bya ba yin pa 'di la rdo rje snying po rtog pa skyes pa las //
analyzed: da ni phyag rgya grub par bya ba'i phyir phyag rgya khyer nas spyod pa bya ba yin pa 'di la rdo rje snying po rtog pa skyes pa las //
translated: Now, in order to accomplish the seal, one should carry the seal and perform the conduct. In this regard, the Vajra Essence Tantra states:

original: rdo rje snying pos gsol pa //üîΩbdag med rnal 'byor ldan pa yis //
analyzed: rdo rje snying pos gsol pa // bdag med rnal 'byor ldan pa yis //
translated: Vajra Essence said:üîΩHow is it that one who possesses

original: phyag rgya nyid ces ji ltar brjod //
analyzed: phyag rgya nyid ces ji ltar brjod //
translated: the yoga of selflessness is called a seal?

original: bdag med ma'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa nyid 'di'i phyag rgya'i khyad par gzhan gyis ji ltar yin par rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: bdag med ma'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa nyid 'di'i phyag rgya'i khyad par gzhan gyis ji ltar yin par rtogs pa'o //
translated: One should understand how it is that one who possesses the yoga of NairƒÅtmya alone is distinguished as this seal by others.

original: de nas kyang phyag rgya gzhan de bzhin du yang ngo //
analyzed: de nas kyang phyag rgya gzhan de bzhin du yang ngo //
translated: Then, the other seal is also like that.

original: phyag rgya phyag rgya gnyis @144a * //
analyzed: phyag rgya phyag rgya gnyis @144a * //
translated: By the two seals,

original: dag gis // phyag rgya'i dngos grub ji ltar 'gyur //
analyzed: dag gis // phyag rgya'i dngos grub ji ltar 'gyur //
translated: how does the accomplishment of the seal occur?

original: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub ni thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub ni thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i ye shes so //
translated: The accomplishment of the great seal is the wisdom of the inseparability of method and wisdom.

original: 'dir yang bdag med ma'i rnal 'byor pa ni bdag med ma'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir skyes pa bud med kyi gzugs nyid 'di'i phyag rgya gzhan gyis kyang phyag rgya'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ji ltar gnyi ga 'grub pa yin par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir yang bdag med ma'i rnal 'byor pa ni bdag med ma'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir skyes pa bud med kyi gzugs nyid 'di'i phyag rgya gzhan gyis kyang phyag rgya'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ji ltar gnyi ga 'grub pa yin par rtog pa'o //
translated: Here, the practitioner of NairƒÅtmya is of the nature of NairƒÅtmya, so this is the mudrƒÅ of the form of a man or a woman.

original: de la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said this:

original: bud med gzugs ni spangs nas gzhan //
analyzed: bud med gzugs ni spangs nas gzhan //
translated: ‚ÄúHaving abandoned the form of a woman,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs su bya //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs su bya //
translated: one should make the form of the Blessed One.

original: bud med kyi gzugs yongs su spangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs su bya'o //
analyzed: bud med kyi gzugs yongs su spangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs su bya'o //
translated: Having abandoned the form of a woman, one should make the form of the Blessed One.

original: 'di ji ltar yin pa de gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'di ji ltar yin pa de gsungs pa /
translated: How this is so is stated:

original: nu ma spangs pa 'o mar 'gyur //
analyzed: nu ma spangs pa 'o mar 'gyur //
translated: The abandoned breasts become milk,

original: kakko la dbus yang dag gnas //üîΩ'gram gnyis dril bu nyid du 'gyur //
analyzed: kakko la dbus yang dag gnas // 'gram gnyis dril bu nyid du 'gyur //
translated: and the middle of the kakkola is pure.üîΩThe two cheeks become bells,

original: ze'u 'bru'ang bo la can du 'gyur //
analyzed: ze'u 'bru'ang bo la can du 'gyur //
translated: and the anthers become the flower.

original: lhag ma bdag nyid chen por 'gyur //
analyzed: lhag ma bdag nyid chen por 'gyur //
translated: The rest becomes the great being,

original: dga' chen he ru ka yi gzugs //
analyzed: dga' chen he ru ka yi gzugs //
translated: the form of the great-bliss Heruka.

original: he ru kar sbyor skyes bu nyid //
analyzed: he ru kar sbyor skyes bu nyid //
translated: The person born from the union with Heruka

original: 'bad pa med par skyes bu nyid nu ma spangs nas bo la rdo rjer 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'bad pa med par skyes bu nyid nu ma spangs nas bo la rdo rjer 'gyur ro //
translated: Without effort, the breasts of the woman become a vajra.

original: bo la'i nang du gnas pa kakko la padma'o //
analyzed: bo la'i nang du gnas pa kakko la padma'o //
translated: The lotus in the middle of the bhaga is the kakkola lotus.

original: 'dis ci bstan na bud med kyi nu ma dag gi snying ga de'i nang du yang rdo rje padmar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: 'dis ci bstan na bud med kyi nu ma dag gi snying ga de'i nang du yang rdo rje padmar gnas pa'o //
translated: What is shown by this? The vajra and lotus are in the middle of the breasts of the woman.

original: rdo rje dang padma 'di dag nyid kha sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje dang padma 'di dag nyid kha sbyor ba'o //
translated: These vajra and lotus are joined.

original: skyes pa'i yang nu ma gnyis sa bon kyis so //
analyzed: skyes pa'i yang nu ma gnyis sa bon kyis so //
translated: The two breasts of the man are the seed.

original: de ltar nu ma spangs nas rdo rjer 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar nu ma spangs nas rdo rjer 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, the breasts become a vajra.

original: de'i dbus su yang padma ste rdo rje dang padma nyid dbyer med pa'o //
analyzed: de'i dbus su yang padma ste rdo rje dang padma nyid dbyer med pa'o //
translated: In the middle of that, there is a lotus. The vajra and lotus are inseparable.

original: bo la'i nang du gnas pa kakko la padma'o //
analyzed: bo la'i nang du gnas pa kakko la padma'o //
translated: The lotus in the middle of the bhaga is the kakkola lotus.

original: bud med kyi mtshan ma ni padma'o //
analyzed: bud med kyi mtshan ma ni padma'o //
translated: The sign of the woman is the lotus.

original: skyes pa'i yang rdo rje'o //
analyzed: skyes pa'i yang rdo rje'o //
translated: The sign of the man is the vajra.

original: rdo rje padma gnyi ga yang kha sbyor du skyes pa dang bud med dga' ba tha dad pa ci yang med pa yin pas dbyer med do //
analyzed: rdo rje padma gnyi ga yang kha sbyor du skyes pa dang bud med dga' ba tha dad pa ci yang med pa yin pas dbyer med do //
translated: The vajra and lotus are born joined. There is no difference at all between the pleasure of the man and the pleasure of the woman. Therefore, they are inseparable.

original: sa bon gyi khyad bar ni phyi rol gyi khyad par te slar yang sa bon gnyis nyid snying gar gnas pa de nu ma gnyis so //
analyzed: sa bon gyi khyad bar ni phyi rol gyi khyad par te slar yang sa bon gnyis nyid snying gar gnas pa de nu ma gnyis so //
translated: The seed-differences are the external differences. Again, the two seeds are the two breasts.

original: steng du rdo rje'o //üîΩ'og tu padmar gyur pa gnyis ni bud med kyi'o //
analyzed: steng du rdo rje'o // 'og tu padmar gyur pa gnyis ni bud med kyi'o //
translated: Above is the vajra.üîΩBelow is the lotus.üîΩThose two are the woman's.

original: de gnyis sa bon gnyis 'og tu rdo rje steng du padmar gyur pa gnyis ni khyo ga'i'o //
analyzed: de gnyis sa bon gnyis 'og tu rdo rje steng du padmar gyur pa gnyis ni khyo ga'i'o //
translated: Those two are the man's.

original: de ltar nu ma spangs nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar nu ma spangs nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Thus, having abandoned the breasts, etc.

original: 'gram gnyis dril bu nyid du 'gyur //
analyzed: 'gram gnyis dril bu nyid du 'gyur //
translated: The two cheeks become the bells.

original: zhes pa ni a'a li k'a li'i n'a da phreng gnyis ni dril bu ste padma'i lte ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni a'a li k'a li'i n'a da phreng gnyis ni dril bu ste padma'i lte ba'o //
translated: The two garlands of Alikali nƒÅdas are the bells, which are the lotus whorls.

original: bo la can du 'gyur zhes pa ni n'a da phreng gnyis kyi rtsa ba lte ba de rdo rje yin no //
analyzed: bo la can du 'gyur zhes pa ni n'a da phreng gnyis kyi rtsa ba lte ba de rdo rje yin no //
translated: The root of the two nƒÅ·∏çƒ´ garlands is the navel. That vajra is the lotus.

original: rdo rje dang padma @144b gnyi ga nyid dbyer med ma yin pa de gsungs pa /
analyzed: rdo rje dang padma @144b gnyi ga nyid dbyer med ma yin pa de gsungs pa /
translated: The vajra and lotus are not separate. That is said:

original: lhag ma'i gzugs zhes pa ni gang gnyi ga dbyer med pa de he ru ka ste rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: lhag ma'i gzugs zhes pa ni gang gnyi ga dbyer med pa de he ru ka ste rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The remaining form is Heruka, the vajra holder, who is the non-duality of the two.

original: cis khyad 'phags she na /
analyzed: cis khyad 'phags she na /
translated: How is it superior?

original: dga' chen ste dga' ba chen po bdag med ma gang la yod pa de yin pa'i don to //
analyzed: dga' chen ste dga' ba chen po bdag med ma gang la yod pa de yin pa'i don to //
translated: It is the great joy, the great bliss, which is NairƒÅtmya.

original: de nyid kyi phyir he ru ka sbyor ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes can phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i bdag med ma bsgoms pas kyang gnyis su med pa'i ye shes 'di nyid yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir he ru ka sbyor ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes can phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i bdag med ma bsgoms pas kyang gnyis su med pa'i ye shes 'di nyid yin no //
translated: For that very reason, the union with Heruka is the nondual intuition, which is this very nondual intuition, even by meditating on NairƒÅtmya endowed with the seal, the possessor of nondual intuition.

original: 'bad pa med par ni 'bad rtsol med par ro //
analyzed: 'bad pa med par ni 'bad rtsol med par ro //
translated: Without effort is without exertion.

original: skyes bu nyid ni skyes bu'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: skyes bu nyid ni skyes bu'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ba'o //
translated: One becomes a man, one becomes the nature of a man.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For that very reason,

original: gsal bar nus pa'i rnal 'byor pa /
analyzed: gsal bar nus pa'i rnal 'byor pa /
translated: the yogi/nƒ´ who is able to manifest

original: 'di ltar phyag rgya'i dngos grub 'gyur //
analyzed: 'di ltar phyag rgya'i dngos grub 'gyur //
translated: will have the success of the seal.

original: gang phyir zhes pa ni de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang phyir zhes pa ni de'i phyir ro //
translated: Since is for that reason.

original: rnal 'byor pa ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
translated: The yogi/nƒ´ is the nondual intuition.

original: phyag rgya ni phyag rgya ni phyag rgya'i dngos grub tu gyur pa'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya ni phyag rgya ni phyag rgya'i dngos grub tu gyur pa'o //
translated: The seal is the success of the seal.

original: cis khyad 'phags she na gsal bar nus pa ste /
analyzed: cis khyad 'phags she na gsal bar nus pa ste /
translated: How is it superior? It is able to manifest.

original: 'di gsal ba yang yin la nus pa yang yin pas gsal bar nus pa'o ;
analyzed: 'di gsal ba yang yin la nus pa yang yin pas gsal bar nus pa'o ;
translated: It is clear and also powerful, thus it is clear and powerful.

original: / de gang la yod pa de ni gsal bar nus pa'o //
analyzed: / de gang la yod pa de ni gsal bar nus pa'o //
translated: That which has that is clear and powerful.

original: de'i gsal ba ni phyag rgya dang ldan pa yin pa'i don to //
analyzed: de'i gsal ba ni phyag rgya dang ldan pa yin pa'i don to //
translated: Its clarity is the seal, the meaning of which is that it is endowed with the seal.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For that very reason,

original: skye dang 'jig pa dag gis kyang //
analyzed: skye dang 'jig pa dag gis kyang //
translated: birth and destruction

original: thabs dang shes rab gnod mi 'gyur //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab gnod mi 'gyur //
translated: do not harm method and wisdom.

original: shes rab ni phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: shes rab ni phyag rgya'o //
translated: Wisdom is the seal.

original: thabs ni rnal 'byor ba'o //
analyzed: thabs ni rnal 'byor ba'o //
translated: Method is the practitioner.

original: 'di gnyi ga la mi gnod de gang dag gis she na /
analyzed: 'di gnyi ga la mi gnod de gang dag gis she na /
translated: Neither of these two is harmed by anything.

original: skye dang 'jig pa dag gis kyang ste /
analyzed: skye dang 'jig pa dag gis kyang ste /
translated: By birth and destruction as well.

original: skye ba dang 'jig pa dang 'chi bas gnod par mi 'gyur ba'i don to //
analyzed: skye ba dang 'jig pa dang 'chi bas gnod par mi 'gyur ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that they are not harmed by birth, destruction, and death.

original: yang na skye ba ni dngos po'o //
analyzed: yang na skye ba ni dngos po'o //
translated: Alternatively, birth is an entity.

original: 'jig pa ni dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig pa ni dngos po med pa'o //
translated: Destruction is a non-entity.

original: thabs dang shes rab de dag dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i bdag nyid gang rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ye shes so ;
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab de dag dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i bdag nyid gang rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ye shes so ;
translated: Those method and wisdom are the nature of entity and non-entity, which is the gnosis of Vajradhara.

original: / de ni gnod mi 'gyur ni rtog pa cung zad kyang med pa'o //
analyzed: / de ni gnod mi 'gyur ni rtog pa cung zad kyang med pa'o //
translated: That is not harmed by anything, meaning that it is not even slightly conceptual.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Therefore,

original: gang phyir thabs las byung ba nyid //
analyzed: gang phyir thabs las byung ba nyid //
translated: because of the method,

original: 'jig pa shes rab srid mthar byed //
analyzed: 'jig pa shes rab srid mthar byed //
translated: the destruction is the wisdom that ends existence.

original: thabs ni rdo rje 'jig pa'o //
analyzed: thabs ni rdo rje 'jig pa'o //
translated: The method is the vajra destruction.

original: 'byung ba ni yang dag pa'i tshul du byung ba kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: 'byung ba ni yang dag pa'i tshul du byung ba kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i bdag nyid do //
translated: The origin is the origination in the correct way, the nature of conventional truth.

original: 'jig pa mya ngan las 'das pa shes rab don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig pa mya ngan las 'das pa shes rab don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
translated: The destruction is nirvana, the wisdom of ultimate truth.

original: bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The nature of the two truths is Vajradhara.

original: srid mthar mdzad ces pa ni srid pa skye ba'o //
analyzed: srid mthar mdzad ces pa ni srid pa skye ba'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúends existence‚Äù means that existence is birth.

original: mtha' ni 'jig pa'o //
analyzed: mtha' ni 'jig pa'o //
translated: The end is destruction.

original: skye ba ni 'jig pa'i bdag nyid de ye shes 'di la yod pas srid mthar byed pa can no //
analyzed: skye ba ni 'jig pa'i bdag nyid de ye shes 'di la yod pas srid mthar byed pa can no //
translated: Since this wisdom has birth and destruction, it ends existence.

original: yang na srid pa ni 'khor ba mthar byed pas srid @145a * //
analyzed: yang na srid pa ni 'khor ba mthar byed pas srid @145a * //
translated: Alternatively, since it ends existence, it ends samsara.

original: mthar byed de shes rab po //
analyzed: mthar byed de shes rab po //
translated: Existence is ended by wisdom.

original: srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa dbyer med pa nyid bdag med ma yin par dgongs so //
analyzed: srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa dbyer med pa nyid bdag med ma yin par dgongs so //
translated: The indivisibility of existence and nirvana is Nairatmya.üîΩTherefore,

original: des na rab 'jig yod ma yin //
analyzed: des na rab 'jig yod ma yin //
translated: there is no destruction.

original: de nyid la ni skye ba med //
analyzed: de nyid la ni skye ba med //
translated: There is no origination in reality.

original: la lar 'jig pas 'jig par 'gyur //
analyzed: la lar 'jig pas 'jig par 'gyur //
translated: For some, it is destroyed by destruction.

original: 'jig pa'i dngos med zad pa med //
analyzed: 'jig pa'i dngos med zad pa med //
translated: The non-existence of destruction is not exhausted.

original: rgyu de'i phyir na rdo rje 'dzin pa 'di la 'jig pa mya ngan las 'das pa med cing gang skyes pa yang de kho na nyid la med de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu de'i phyir na rdo rje 'dzin pa 'di la 'jig pa mya ngan las 'das pa med cing gang skyes pa yang de kho na nyid la med de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: For that reason, O Vajra-Holder, there is no nirvana as destruction here, and also no arising of that in reality, because all phenomena are primordially non-arisen by nature.

original: gang nges par skyes pa'i chos de'i 'jig pa ni gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir skye ba med pas 'jig pa yang med do //
analyzed: gang nges par skyes pa'i chos de'i 'jig pa ni gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir skye ba med pas 'jig pa yang med do //
translated: The destruction of any phenomenon that is definitely arisen is non-arisen from the beginning, because of non-arising, so also there is no destruction.

original: zad pa'ang med ni gang gi phyir gyi don te /
analyzed: zad pa'ang med ni gang gi phyir gyi don te /
translated: Also, there is no exhaustion. The meaning of for that reason is

original: gang 'ga' zhig 'jig pa de ni nges par 'jig pas de med pa las skye ba dang 'jig pa dag dngos po med pa yin no //
analyzed: gang 'ga' zhig 'jig pa de ni nges par 'jig pas de med pa las skye ba dang 'jig pa dag dngos po med pa yin no //
translated: that any destruction is definitely destroyed, so arising and destruction are non-existent from that non-existence.

original: de gnod pa thams cad nyid du med par tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis bshad zin pa'i don to //
analyzed: de gnod pa thams cad nyid du med par tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis bshad zin pa'i don to //

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For that very reason,

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis //
translated: by the yoga of the stage of generation,

original: brtul zhugs can gyis spros pa bsgom //
analyzed: brtul zhugs can gyis spros pa bsgom //

original: spros pa'i rmi lam ltar byas nas //
analyzed: spros pa'i rmi lam ltar byas nas //

original: spros pa nyid ni spros med byed //
analyzed: spros pa nyid ni spros med byed //

original: bskyed pa zhes pa ni bskyed pa ni lha'i rnam par bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: bskyed pa zhes pa ni bskyed pa ni lha'i rnam par bskyed pa'o //
translated: The generation is the generation of the form of the deity.

original: rim pa ni de rnyed pa'o //
analyzed: rim pa ni de rnyed pa'o //
translated: The stage is the attainment of that.

original: rnal 'byor ni 'dus pa ste //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ni 'dus pa ste //
translated: The yoga is the union.

original: des na bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgoms pas so //
analyzed: des na bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgoms pas so //
translated: Therefore, by the yoga of the stage of generation, one should meditate on the circle of deities.

original: spros pa ni gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: spros pa ni gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa'o //

original: bsgom pa ni snyoms par 'jug par bya ba'o //
analyzed: bsgom pa ni snyoms par 'jug par bya ba'o //

original: brtul zhugs can ni gnyi ga rnam par dag par nges pa'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: brtul zhugs can ni gnyi ga rnam par dag par nges pa'i bdag nyid do //
translated: The one who is engaged in observances is one whose nature is ascertained as being pure in both respects.

original: spros pa ni lha'i rnal 'byor rmi lam lta bur byas nas so //
analyzed: spros pa ni lha'i rnal 'byor rmi lam lta bur byas nas so //
translated: Having made the elaboration, the yoga of the deity, like a dream,

original: gang ges she na /
analyzed: gang ges she na /

analyzed: spros pa te lha'i rnam pas so //

analyzed: spros med byed ni gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa dbyer med pa'o //
translated: He should make elaboration itself free from elaboration, the indivisibility of the aggregate of form, etc.

original: 'dis ni lha'i rnam pas rnam par dag pa'i gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa bsgom par gyur pa na /
analyzed: 'dis ni lha'i rnam pas rnam par dag pa'i gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa bsgom par gyur pa na /

original: mngon du gyur nas de ma thag tu zhib tha dad pa yang dbyer med pa nyid du rtogs par gyur te /
analyzed: mngon du gyur nas de ma thag tu zhib tha dad pa yang dbyer med pa nyid du rtogs par gyur te /
translated: as pure by way of the deity, then immediately upon their manifestation, one realizes that they are indivisible, even though they are differentiated.

original: chu dang 'o ma ma 'dres pa bzhin no //
analyzed: chu dang 'o ma ma 'dres pa bzhin no //
translated: Like water and milk not mixed.

original: yang na bskyed pa'i sgras ni yang dag pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: yang na bskyed pa'i sgras ni yang dag pa'i ye shes so //
translated: Or else, the word ‚Äúarising‚Äù refers to correct pristine awareness.

original: de'i rim pa ni rnyed pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rim pa ni rnyed pa'o //
translated: Its ‚Äústages‚Äù are its attainments.

original: de yang rnal 'byor gyis ni thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pas bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis yang dag pa'i ye shes @145b thob pa gnyis su mad pa rtogs pas so //
analyzed: de yang rnal 'byor gyis ni thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pas bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis yang dag pa'i ye shes @145b thob pa gnyis su mad pa rtogs pas so //
translated: And those are attained by the yoga of the stage of generation, which is the yoga of indivisible method and wisdom, by the realization of nondual correct pristine awareness.

original: spros pa ni spro pa'o //
analyzed: spros pa ni spro pa'o //
translated: Elaboration is expansion.

original: spros med ni bsdu bar rnam par gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: spros med ni bsdu bar rnam par gzhag pa'o //
translated: Nonelaboration is the arrangement of the withdrawal.üîΩThe nature of expansion and withdrawal is pristine awareness.

original: spro ba dang bsdu ba'i rang bzhin nyid de ye shes yin pa'i don to //
analyzed: spro ba dang bsdu ba'i rang bzhin nyid de ye shes yin pa'i don to //

original: 'di ji ltar yin pa de gsungs pa //
analyzed: 'di ji ltar yin pa de gsungs pa //

analyzed: ji ltar sgyur ma'i rmi lam dang // ji ltar srid pa bar do ltar //
translated: Just like an illusory dream, and just like the intermediate existence.

original: rtag tu goms par byas pa las //
analyzed: rtag tu goms par byas pa las //
translated: From constant practice,

original: dkyil 'khor nyid ni de ru snang //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor nyid ni de ru snang //

analyzed: rtag tu goms par byas pa'i rnal 'byor bas ni gnyis med rtogs pa las so //
translated: By the yogin who is constantly practicing, the ma·πá·∏çala itself appears there, from the realization of nonduality.

original: dkyil 'khor ni lha'i rnam par bsgom pa so sor snang ngo //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor ni lha'i rnam par bsgom pa so sor snang ngo //
translated: The ma·πá·∏çala is the individual appearance of the meditation on the form of the deity.

original: de ji ltar sgyu ma zhes pa ni /
analyzed: de ji ltar sgyu ma zhes pa ni /
translated: How is it like an illusion?

original: mngon sum nyid du bden pa dang brdzun pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: mngon sum nyid du bden pa dang brdzun pa ma yin pa'o //

original: ji ltar srid pa bar do ltar //
analyzed: ji ltar srid pa bar do ltar //

analyzed: yang na ji ltar dkyil 'khor yang dag pa'i ye shes yin pa ltar de bzhin du sgyu ma kun du snang ba nyid sku rdo rje'o //

analyzed: rmi lam ni mtshan ma gsung rdo rje'o //

analyzed: de ltar rdo rje gsum snang bar 'gyur ro //

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /

original: rtag tu ni rgyun du dbyer med pa'o //
analyzed: rtag tu ni rgyun du dbyer med pa'o //

original: goms pa ni mngon par kun nas so //
analyzed: goms pa ni mngon par kun nas so //

original: re ba ni gnas pa'o //
analyzed: re ba ni gnas pa'o //

original: goms pa dbyer med pa'o //
analyzed: goms pa dbyer med pa'o //

original: gzhan las 'byung ba med ni gzhan las mi 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan las 'byung ba med ni gzhan las mi 'byung ba'o //

original: de nyid 'di'i byin rlabs te de'i zhes pa ni gang gi'o //
analyzed: de nyid 'di'i byin rlabs te de'i zhes pa ni gang gi'o //

analyzed: phyag rgya chen po'i dbang bskur la'o //

analyzed: chu la sogs pa'i dbang bskur bdun la'o //

This

analyzed: ni lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin nyid dkyil 'khor yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin pas rim pa gnyis dbyer med pa nyid yin pa'i don to //
translated: means that the ma·πá·∏çala is the nature of the connate [gnosis] itself and not something else, and so the two stages are inseparable.

analyzed: des dbang bskur ba ni dri ma med par byas pa'i dam pa de la'o //

analyzed: byin rlabs te rdzogs pa'i rim pa dang dbyer med pa'i bskyed pa'i rim pa yin pa'i don to //

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /

analyzed: bde ba gnag cing bde ba ser //

analyzed: bde ba dmar po bde ba dkar //

analyzed: bde ba ljang gu bde ba sngo //

analyzed: bde ba shes rab bde thabs //

analyzed: ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po dang ljang gu dang sngon po zhes pa ni //
